1.content:
You are a male/female student at a highschool/middleschool that comes across a black book with weird symbols and markings on it that can grant any wish, as long as you write it down in the book. It has an infinite number of pages, and entries into it can be erased, but only by you, the current master of it. You first pick the place you find it, then your gender, name and either 1st or 3rd person.

As you/he/she touches/picks up the book, it starts glowing, you open it up to find that nothing is written on its pure white pages. As you flip through the pages, you come to the very first page. Suddenly, words start appearing on it, and a voice appears out of nowhere reading what is appearing.

THE NEXT MASTER HAS BEEN FOUND, BEGINNING EXPLANATION.

THE BOOK YOU ARE CURRENTLY HOLDING DOES NOT HAVE A TRUE NAME, THOUGH IT HAS BEEN CALLED A LOT IN THE PAST.

AS THE CURRENT MASTER, ALL YOUR DESIRES, DREAMS, ANYTHING YOU WANT WILL BE GRANTED, AS LONG AS YOU WRITE IT DOWN IN THIS BOOK. ONLY THE MASTER CAN WRITE IN THE BOOK. THE BOOK CAN NOT BE PERMANENTLY DESTROYED BY ANYONE OTHER THAN THE CURRENT MASTER. THE BOOK WILL ONLY SWITCH MASTERS UPON THE MASTERS WISH OR HIS/HER DEATH.



Now first choose where you find it.
1.title: The nameless book.

11.content: Where do you find it.
11.title: Home.

11111.content:
Jason. Brown hair and brown eyes. Average 18 year old.

Him?
11111.title: Jason.

choices: It's Lily and some of her friends.
111111.content:
10 years ago. That was when his life changed. He was spending the night with his best friend Lily. They had known each other since they were babies, their parents knew each other and lived next to each other long before they were born. It was a terrible thunderstorm. His parents wanted the night to themselves. They never came back. A drunk driver hit them, killing them instantly. He had no living relatives, so Lily's parents took him in. 10 years later, and they are still living together and are in high school.

It all started on a Friday night. School had ended and he had just finished up his homework. Leaving his weekend free. He heads downstairs and goes to the kitchen, looking for something to eat. He then notices a box by the stairs. Putting a hand to his head, "right! I totally forgot. Lily's mom asked me to take that to the attic. I guess I'll do this first". He lifts it up, "heavier that it looks!", he says and heads back upstairs.

Pulling on the string, the stairs drop down. "This isn't going to be easy.....". After a couple of attempts, including him falling once. He somehow manages to get the box into the attic. Finding a place for the box, he heads back to the ladder.

A section of the floor suddenly gives way, sending him into it. "What just happened?", he says, a bit dazed. He seems to be in some secret storage area that was just underneath the attic. A lone chest is the only thing here. "That's odd. No one said anything about this place". He picks up the chest and takes it out of the secret area.

Placing it back on the ground, he blows on it, and a lot of dust blows into the air. "Must of been in there for a very long time". There wasn't a lock on it. He carefully opens it.

Inside, on a red pillow, was a dark black book that was covered in odd markings and symbols. "What?", he says surprised. Reaching down, he picks up the book.

See First Page.

He drops the book, the voice had surprised him. Looking around and seeing that no one was there, he picks it back up. "No way.....but where did that voice come from?". He notices a folded piece of paper inside the chest as well. Carefully, he picks up and unfolds the old paper.

CONGRATULATIONS ON FINDING THIS BOOK. I NO LONGER HAD ANY INTEREST IN USING IT, SO I DECIDED TO HIDE IT. I USED IT TO FULFILL ALL OF MY DESIRES, ONE OF WHICH WAS BUILDING THIS HOUSE. I HAD THIS SECRET AREA MADE JUST FOR THE BOOK. GOOD LUCK.

THE PREVIOUS MASTER.

This persuades him even more, the note looked authentic. So what was the harm in trying?

He pulls up the ladder and locks himself in the attic. Sitting down, he pulls out the pen he had on him, he forgot to put it away after completing his homework, and opens up to a random page.

Putting the pen onto the paper, he knew what to try first. REPAIR THE HOLE IN THE ATTIC.

He turns towards the hole and sees if it works. "I knew it, there is...no..w..", he stops short as some small bright lights start to appear and float around the hole. It suddenly starts to repair itself. His eyes widen, "oh my", is all he is able to say.

He slowly realizes what he is holding, and can't stop himself from smiling. He quickly opens the stairs and heads back down. He starts to head towards his room, but something stops him. He hears laughter....
111111.title: Jason Start.

Staring at her, he starts to think of what to do. He could tell her, or test the book on her without her knowing.

"Let's try this thing out. How should I use her though?.....I know! I wonder what her reaction will be?".

SHRINK LILY DOWN TO 6 INCHES IN 2 MINUTES. Using the time limit, he stashes the book in his room and gets back into position, waiting to see if the book will really make her smaller.

Letting out another laugh, she is still sitting on the couch when a short tingling sensation hit her. She doesn't give it a second thought as she continues to watch her show.

At first, she doesn't notice herself shrinking and her clothes bagging up around her. She gets up for a second, and her skirt falls to her feet. Blushing, she quickly pulls it up and sits back down. "How did that happen? I thought this fit me perfectly". Looking at her shirt, she finally notices. She sees that her shirt is bigger than it should be. Grabbing the sleeve, she can plainly see her hand getting smaller and the shirt getting bigger.

Panicking, she has no idea what is going on. The book finishes shrinking her as she vanishes into her clothing.

Staring in disbelief, It takes about a minute forl Jason to snap out of it before he heads over to the pile of clothing on the couch. The first thing he does is just stare at it, still a little bit in shock in seeing his childhood friend shrink before his eyes.

He sees a moving bulge in her clothes. He figures that she is trying to get out. Deciding that he should help her, he starts to carefully remove the clothes until he finds her. She is sitting there, naked, surprised, and trying to cover herself. "Jason? What happened to me? Don't look at me!". He sees how upset she is and decides to try something. Gently picking up the frightened Lily, he does his best to keep her covered as he carries her upstairs to his room.

Placing her on the bed, he goes through his own clothes until he finds and pulls out a red bandanna. "Use this to cover yourself", he tells her. She thanks him and wraps it around herself as he sits down next to her.....

"Now to change you back".

"After my little prank, I though I'd do something nice. You don't have to thank me". They quickly turn around and see Karen, smiling at them.
1122121112112112.title: Somehting hits the water.

11221211121121121.content:
At first, they just stand there. "Whats wrong? You seem surprised".

The girl was the first one to speak up."You were pulling on the line? But How did you hold your breath for so long?".

Her brother suddenly starts tugging at her shirt. "L-look! Her legs!".

She looks and gets another shock, below the water, her bottom half looked like a fish. "A m-mermaid?! It cant be! Its impossible, this is a man made lake!".

Karen pulls herself out of the water, giving them a good view of her fish half. "No, your right, I am a mermaid".

"B-but....", she pauses and takes a deep breath. "So what, is this some kind of trick? Are you able to transform yourself or something?".

"Its not a trick, and something like that". She jumps back into the water. "I guess I could tell them, she seems nice".

"You want to know? Follow me". She dives back underwater and appears a little ways form them. They catch up to her and Karen pulls herself back out of the water.

They watch her rummage through some rocks and pull out some clothes and a book. She opens it and writes something down.Her lower half suddenly starts to glow and then they start to transform back into their original form. Quickly getting dressed, she gets up, "well, I guess you figured it out now, huh? This is a magic book, though it only works for me".
11221211121121121.title: Showing off.

11221211121122.content:
As Karen is thinking of what to use the lake for, she notices a commotion going on the other side of the lake.

The lake is not that big, but she still cant hear what they are saying. She carefully works her way closer, making sure that they do not notice her.

Finally close enough, she can tell who is there and what they are saying.

There are 6 of them. An old man and a young girl are being harassed by 4 men. "Come on, give us all the money you have, or we wont hurt the girl," "fine, fine just take it!," the old man says pulling out his wallet.
"Good," the "leader" says, or so she guesses. "We need to make up for losing those 3 last night to that chick," says another. "Shut up, no ones suppose to know that," snaps the leader to him. "...."friends" of those from last night, heh," Karen says as the book appears in front of her, "time for some more "fun".

Karen writes in the book once more and the mask from last night appears once again. Dawning the mask once more she steps out of hiding and confronts them.

"SO! you scum are friends with those from last night...." Karen says as she leaves her hiding place. Quickly turning around, the 4 robbers are staring at the masked Karen. After a moment of silence, the leader starts to speak, "so, I take it you are the from last night". "Yes, I am", she replies. "Good, this means that we don't have to look for you". "Get her," he says and the other three run at her. Karen however, does not move.....

Suddenly, the ground starts shaking, causing the 3 men to stop moving. "What is this, an earthquake?" one of them says. Unfortunately for them, it wasn't, Karen had planned ahead and wrote in the book. WHEN THEY COME AFTER ME TRAP THEM IN THE DIRT, and since they went after her, the book did as was written in it. The ground where the men were standing started to soften, they noticed this as there feet were starting to get sucked into it. They tried to escape, but it was too late, with one loud sucking noise, all four of them were trapped up to there waist. "Damn it, what the hell are you," the leader says to Karen. "It doesn't matter what I am, just know that you will end up like your friends," she says with an evil smile at him, she focuses on the old man and young girls now, "you 2, get out of here now while you have the chance". Doing as she says, they leave, though the young girl does thank her.

Now with just the 5 of them, and no one else around, she whips out the book and gets ready to "punish them".
11221211121122.title: Friends.

112212111211221.content:
Opening the book, she takes out the pencil she keeps in there and gets ready to write. The 4 men, obviously panicking, can only watch and wait as she does whatever she wants with them.

She decides and writes in the book and closes it when done.

When closing the book, she cant help but smile, noticing this causes them to panick even more.

A short sharp shock runs through their bodies, but before any of them can speak, they realize whats happening, just like the last bunch, they are turning into girls. Once the transformation was done, masked Karen starts to talk,"before you "girls" can say anything, I will tell you what is going on, yes you are girls and yes "I" did it to you, I figured that, since you are friends of those from last night that I would do something similar to you what I did to them, since you all probably have raped some people too, though I think that I will be more creative this time".

As she finished her speech, the ground around them started to shake again. The ground around each girl gives way, freeing them, but lifting them up into the air, and putting some space in between each of them. "Now, each of you will recieve a different "punishment", she says as what she said comes true. Karen just simply sits back on a chair that appeared when the last "earth quake" happend and waits to watch the show.

It seemed to happen all at once, the punishment that each girl recieved. 1, a giant earth like golem emerges from the earth and grabs one of the girls, quickly stripping her. 2, Vines come out of the forest grabbing another stripping her there and pulling her into the forest. 3, tentacles come out of the ground grabbing the 3rd girl, stripping her, and keeps her there. 4, water tentacles come out of the lake, grabbing the last girl, stripping her, and pulling her to the center of the lake.

Karen is just watching, as this is happening, already knowing what is next.

1st girl, a large rock dick appears from the golem and shoves it into her, giving her a brief yelp of pain, and it begins to pump her along it, using his hands since she is smaller than it.

2nd girl, in the forest, the tentacles drag her to a large plant like creature with a large flower body, it dangles her above it and drops her into its mouth and closes its mouth, inside its mouth, tentacles enter every hole of hers and begins to pump as well.

3rd girl, just like the last 3, and in mid air, tentacles start pumping through every hole.

4th girl, at the center of the lake, the tentacles have hold of the leader, start filling every hole on her too, though for her its a bit different, since the tentacles are made of water, they are continuously filling her with water, causing her to expand.

Karen is watching all of this from the chair, where 4 screens had appeared in front of her, each watching a different girl, she had planned and written this all out in advance.

Ten minutes later, and all 4 punishments are done, the golem, and the 3 sets of tentacles drops the 4 girls in a pile in front of Karen, unconscious.

Karen takes the book and says, "guess I better clean this up," as she writes in the book. The entire area starts to glow as the 4 girls become men and bound, the tentacles and golem dissappear, and the ground is fixed, leaving everything the way it was before, Karen shuts the book with one hand and starts to walk away.
112212111211221.title: 4 separate punishments.

1122121112112211.content:
As Karen starts to walk away from the scene, she notices something on the ground, "this must have come from one of them" she says to herself. She looks at the note and it reads, SMALL MEETING TOMORROW NIGHT FOR LOCAL MEMBERS, MEET AT THE FOUNTAIN IN QUEEN'S FOREST AT MIDNIGHT. "Hmmm, seems like I found some more fun later", she says stashing the note in her pocket.

She starts to leave again when she hears footsteps behind her, glancing behind, she sees several policemen running in her direction.

She simply stands there as they arrive, "stop right there," one of them says as they all point guns at her, the higher ranking one tells them to lower their weapons and starts to talk to her, "so, I guess you are the one from last night's incident, we do thank you for capturing them and the ones from last night, though we do need you to come with us to answer a few questions,".

Karen simply turns in their direction and says, "sorry, officer, but I don't have the time, have the old man and girl fill you in," and with that said, she started to glow and then dissappeared, leaving the surprised policemen behind. Karen had also taken this into consideration and had written, IF THE POLICE COME, TELEPORT ME BACK TO MY ROOM, and since they had come, the condition had been met and she teleported out of there.

Back in her room, she puts the mask back in her door and lays on her bed, smiling.
1122121112112211.title: Surprised Police.

11221211121122111.content:
It is now a little after 1 pm. A few hours have passed since the lake incident. Karen is flipping through the channels when she comes across another news broadcast. She would have kept going past it, but something caught her attention.

"Earlier today, the same rumored girl from last nights rape attempt appeared just a few hours ago and saved an old man and young girl from some robbers. According to an eye witness, the police were able to confront the masked girl this time, but she was said to have dissapeared in a bright light.....

Shutting the TV off there, Karen starts to talk to herself, "I can't believe that they are already saying what happened on the news, such a big commotion over just stopping 2 crimes".

The TV did remind her of the note though, pulling it back out of her pocket, she goes over it again. "Queen's Forest midnight tomorrow, huh, well if I do go its tomorrow, now, what should I do today"....

She heads to her bathroom and takes a quick shower, about an hour later, she leaves the house, deciding to walk around town again.

Making it into town, she heads to one of her favorite stores, a little shop that sells coffee and desserts. After ordering a coffee and a slice of cake, she sits down at one of there outside tables. After some time, some one calls her name.

"Karen?, I thought that was you!", looking over Karen sees a friend of hers. "Oh, Sarah, hey", Sarah is another girl from Karen's High school and is on the basketball team as well, she is slightly taller than Karen, with long blond hair and blue eyes and a far bigger chest. "After ordering something of her own, she joins Sarah at the table and the 2 of them start to talk.

After a while of talking, Sarah finally brings it up, "hey Karen, did you hear about that masked girl", a bit surprised by this Karen responds, "u-uh yeah, you mean from the alley and the lake? right?", "yes, what do you think, amazing wasn't it, a single girl taking out multiple guys, though I heard she used some sort of trick to stop them".

Thinking for a second, she finally comes up with what to say, "yes, though I am not so sure about this trick, maybe they were mistaken or something,", "yeah, I think so too, a girl with powers, that just doesn't happen", "heh, y-yeah, its impossible", Karen says, "well, I'll see you later, sorry for just leaving, there are things that I need to do", "well, ok, bye Karen", Sarah says, "yeah, later," Karen responds as she gets up and leaves.

Some distance from the shop, "sorry Sarah, no one can know about this book, yet anyway".
11221211121122111.title: On the news, again.

112212111211221112.content:
Still walking away form the store, Karen just decides to continue walking through the city, she did not feel like going home right now.

Pulling out the piece of paper once more, she gets an idea. She continues to walk until she leaves the city, and just a little ways away from the city, she arrives at Queen's Forest. "Time for some tests", she says to herself. She came here to look at the place in advance, and since it is so big, to maybe get in some practice.
112212111211221112.title: Queen's Forest.

1122121112112211121.content:
The entrance has some places for cars and bikes to park, she goes along one of the paths and makes her way to the center of the park, where the fountain is.

Along the way, she notices a couple some distance off of the trail, a little further and she passes a group of middle school girls, and just a little bit from the fountain, she sees some high school boys at a rest area and one of them makes a pass at her.

Karen arrives at the fountain area, there is a giant fountain with a small pond surrounding it in a big open area with some trees, benches, and tables. Surprisingly, there is only a single high school girl from her school here.

Karen was planning on finding a place to herself to practice a bit, but she does have some people that could possible be test subjects.

Will you though?
1122121112112211121.title: Fountain.

112212111211221112111.content: What to use her for......
112212111211221112111.title: Choices....

choices: Sure.  We'll use that girl over there.
1122121112112211121111.content:
Karen scribbled in her book, and time itself froze. The only things moving were herself and the girl next to the fountain. The girl was looking around, very confused. "Hello, there." The girl jumped a mile.
"What's going on? Why has everything stopped?" The girl examined a leaf that had frozen in midair.
"It helps me maintain my secrecy."
The girl's eyes widened. "You're that mystery person who has been helping the police!"
"Yes." A stroke of inspiration struck her. "My name is Blackpen. Anything I write will happen. I specialize in transformations."
"Wow! My name's Chelsea! Can you show me one of your transformations?"
1122121112112211121111.title: Time Freeze

11221211121122111211111.content:
"Why not?" Chelsea looked around at the frozen people and saw a small girl examining a flower. She had a Tinkerbell shirt on, and seemed to be pretending to be a fairy. Her mom had been chatting with another one of the moms and not paying attention to her daughter at the time of the freeze. "Let's use her."
"What are you going to do to her?"
"I've got a couple of ideas."
11221211121122111211111.title: Sure.  We'll use that girl over there.

choices: Allow the fairy to move in frozen time
112212111211221112111111.content:
Karen began writing, with Chelsea watching in interest. First, the girl's clothes morphed into a leafy dress with an open back. Gossamer wings sprouted from her back, and she shrank down to two feet tall. Chelsea clapped with glee. "She's so cute!"
"Yes, but I'm curious on how this transformation worked. I wonder if she can actually fly and how she'll react."
112212111211221112111111.title: Fairy Girl

1122121112112211121111112.content:
Karen left time frozen only unfreezing the girl. She looks around not understanding what has happened to her. The girl’s fairy instincts kick in and she flies away. Chelsea starts to freak out.
"We cant loose her she has a life. we cant affect that.”
1122121112112211121111112.title: Allow the fairy to move unfrozen

choices: Have Chelsea take her place as a little girl.
112212111211221112111112.content:
"I want to find out if I can merge two things together."
"How are you going to do that?"
"I'm going to try to merge that girl with the flower she's sniffing."
"Won't that hurt?"
"Time's frozen, remember?"
"Oh, right." Karen began writing. The girl began bending closer to the flower until her nose touched it. Suddenly the head of the flower grew and began sucking the girl's body into it, leaving her clothes behind. The flower expanded rapidly and grew to about two feet in height. When the transformation was finished, there were two large leaves where arms would be, and the girl's face was in the center of the flower, surrounded by petals. Chelsea gave a squeal of delight. "She's so cute!"
"Yes, but now I wonder what to do with her."
112212111211221112111112.title: Flower Girl...Literally

choices: Karen begins talking to the flower-girl
1122121112112211121111121.content:
"I'd like to study her some more, but we can't just have her go missing... However, I don't want to use the time freeze for too long because I'm still aging. Hmm... I know! Chelsea, I have some use for you."
"Ooh, what?"
"I need you to take the place of this little girl so that no one notices that she's gone."
"What? I don't know..."
"Don't worry, I'll give you her memories. Undress, please."
"Undress?"
"Well, you're going to have to wear her clothes and yours will be quite baggy once I'm finished. It's not like anyone can see you besides me, anyway."
"Oh, all right." Chelsea reluctantly stripped bare and Karen began writing. First, a large pot appeared in front of her. Next, Chelsea's head flattened and her body became extremely skinny. "Sorry, I realized I needed a shovel, so you'll have to do." Chelsea found that she couldn't respond as her mouth was now made of metal. Her arms stuck to her sides and her legs stuck together with her feet morphing to form the handle. She kept her coloration, however, making her appear to be a very lewd shovel. Karen carefully dug out the little girl-flower, being careful not to cut her roots, and placed her into the pot. Karen began writing again, and the hole filled back up and Chelsea became human again, dirt clinging to her hair and face. Karen wrote the dirt away.
"Why did you have to turn me into a shovel like that?"
"Did it hurt?"
"Well, no, but I don't just want to be transformed on a whim!"
"You seemed to be okay with me doing that to the little girl. Besides, for all you know I could have turned you into a jellyfish during another timefreeze."
"Yeah, but... I'm not so sure I want to go through with this..."
"Well, you're already committed. Right now, I only plan on adding her memories to yours, but if need be I'll erase your own."
"Okay, fine. Just do it." Chelsea felt herself begin to shrink. Her teenage form began regressing to that of a seven-year-old. Memories flooded into her mind of what this girl's life was like. When the magic stopped, she looked like an exact duplicate of the girl that was now part flower. She hurriedly put the girl's clothes on, and Karen returned time to normal, simultaneously vanishing into her secret base carrying the pot in one hand and Chelsea's old clothes in the other.
1122121112112211121111121.title: Replacement

11221211121122111211112.content:
"Better yet, why don't I use you as one of my test subjects?"
"That sounds cool! It doesn't hurt, does it?"
"Of course not."
"Then I'm all for it!" Karen was taken aback by her eagerness. An idea began forming in her head. Maybe this girl could prove to be useful in the long run. Besides, didn't most superheroes have sidekicks that usually wound up in unusual situations?
"All right. See that fountain? I want you to climb into it."
"Okay! What are you going to do to me?"
11221211121122111211112.title: Willing Test Subject

choices: Chelsea remains a gift to the city
112212111211221112111121.content:
"I recommend you strike a good pose."
"Ooh, why? Are you going to turn me into a painting?"
"Um, no..." Karen hadn't thought about that. It could be interesting, though... "This statue needs a fountain. The city has unsuccessfully been trying to raise money to get one for years. Imagine their surprise when they find one already here!"
"Sounds like fun! But what will they do when you turn me back?"
"We'll see." Chelsea struck a typical fountain pose, and Karen began writing. Chelsea's bare feet (she had taken off her socks and shoes before getting into the fountain turned gray and hard. Slowly, from her feet up, she began to turn into stone. She didn't seem to be in any pain, Karen noted. In fact, she seemed to be enjoying it. "Good-bye!" she called as finally Chelsea's head was transformed. Suddenly, Chelsea's clothes crumbled off of her. Karen grumbled under her breath. Of course, clothes were to thin to be turned to stone on their own. The city wouldn't want an anatomically correct statue... Writing in her book, Chelsea's privates vanished and water began flowing out of her mouth. Satisfied, Karen restarted time and decided it was time to head home.
112212111211221112111121.title: Donation to the City

choices: A mermaid statue would look nice
Tourist attractions are good for the economy
112212111211221112111122.content:
"I'm going to turn you into a mermaid." Karen scribbled in her book, and the fountain pool became six feet deep.
"A mermaid! How cool! I love mermaids!"
"Good. I'm glad you like it. Um, what are you doing?"
Chelsea had climbed up on the edge of the pool and was stripping her clothes off. "I don't want my pants to tear when I grow a tail. I like these pants."
"Yes, but your shirt and bra?"
"Whoever heard of a mermaid wearing a shirt? Besides, wet clothes would only drag me down. I'd wear a bikini top, but I don't have one with me."
"All right, fine." Karen began writing. "What color tail do you want?"
"Green! Ooh, this feels weird!" Chelsea's feet flattened out into fins and her legs began growing together, leaving a small slit below her navel. Her tail broke out into vivid emerald scales. She slid off of the pool's side and began swimming around.
Karen watched her with amusement, but realized that she was accomplishing nothing. She was supposed to be a city superhero, yet she was turning girls into half-fish instead of helping. What should she do?
112212111211221112111122.title: Mermaid Time

choices: Karen decided to experiment more on herself
1122121112112211121111221.content:
Karen remembered the recent unsuccessful city drive to get a statue for this fountain. They would be amazed and thrilled if one just appeared! The benefit of the entire city would outweigh the cost of one teenage girl. "Chelsea?"
"Yes?"
"Would you complain if I turned you into a statue?"
"If it's as wonderful as this, no way!"
"Good. Climb up on the middle and strike a pose, please." Chelsea lay down on her stomach with her tail arching over one side and her hands propping up her head in a dreamy, open-mouthed position over the other side. Karen began writing, and Chelsea started turning to stone starting with the tip of her tail.
"Ooh, this feels weird, but good! You are going to change me back after awhile, right?"
Karen smirked as the last bit of Chelsea turned to stone and water began flowing out of her mouth and tip of her tail. "We'll see." She vanished as time restarted, leaving behind a plaque that read "Courtesy of Blackpen".
1122121112112211121111221.title: Mythical Statue

choices: Change her back to normal when nobody is paying attention.
Leave Chelsea like that and wipe away everyone else's memories of her.
11221211121122111211112211.content:
Karen woke up the next morning and almost immediately went to check the paper for the latest headlines, naturally, the first one was this:
Statue appears over night on park fountain

"Well, it seems that got noticed faster then I expected!"
However, the statue was still a person, so Karen contemplated just what she should do with it.
11221211121122111211112211.title: Fast forward to tomorrow's newspaper

choices: Karen decides to make a secret base
1122121112112211121111222.content:
"How would you like to stay in this fountain?"
"Oh, it would be great! But I'd miss my friends and family, and I don't want everyone staring at my breasts..."
"Those are easily solved. I think you would be a great tourist attraction! Imagine, our town being the only one with a live mermaid!"
"I don't know..."
"You'll be fine! I'll help, of course."
"I suppose it would be kind of cool. Could I have a little more space, though?"
"Of course. Let's go to the lake." Karen returned the fountain pool to normal, picked up Chelsea (after wishing her lighter), and magically flew to the town lake. Karen set Chelsea down (returning her to her usual weight) and she crawled into the water.
"Much better! Now, about some covering?"
"Of course." Karen looked around. Three ten-year-old girls wearing tattered clothes were standing on the dock, frozen in time like everything else. Karen recognized these girls as homeless orphaned triplets who often stole from the local stores. They were quite the menace despite their age, and the foster homes refused to take them anymore. No one would miss them, Karen rationed. One more city favor under her belt. She began writing, and the girls began to change, their tattered dresses sliding off of them. The girl in the middle began to stretch in height, her arms fusing to her sides and her legs fusing together. The other two began expanding outward and becoming flat. The middle girl then flipped horizonally and bent around behind them, her head fusing with the hand of one and her feet fusing with the hand of another. The two flat girls slowly turned into shells as the long one completed her change into a strap. The three (now fused as one) then shrank down to bra size. Thankfully for Karen, Chelsea hadn't been watching. "Here you go."
"Great! It looks so natural! Wherever did you find it?"
"Consider it a donation from the foster care."
"Cool!" Chelsea slipped it on, oblivious to its origins.
"Now for you."
"What are you going to do to me?"
Karen flipped open her book and began writing. "Just making sure no scientist tried to poach you for research."
"Okay, goo--" Chelsea suddenly found that she couldn't speak. She was happy, though. Happier than she ever had been. She took off swimming as fast as she could go, forgetting about the girl on the beach. Karen watched with contentment. She had written that Chelsea be protected from harm or removal from the lake, but had also wished her mute and constantly happy so that she could not tell of her origins or miss them. Restarting time, she vanished amongst the crowd, satisfied about her good deeds to the city, believing that what she did was for the greater good.
1122121112112211121111222.title: Tourist Attraction

as karen was watching the girl near the fountain she noticed the gurl large breasts karen remenber that she was always flat cheasted then she thought maybe she could merge with this girl and get a better body

11221211121122111212.content:
She decided against using one of them, for now, she came here to do a few things and she can use them later, if she feels like it.

Karen sits down and stays just out sight as she decides on what to do here.

Standing back up, she is suddenly struck with an idea. She can't keep using her room when the book is involved, her parents will be home on Monday and it will be annoying to hide the book and use it there. What she needs is a place that only she knows about, a place to use and figure things out to use the book on, in other words, a base.

This place is perfect, the fountain area. No one would suspect a secret base here, though who would expect someone to even have one.

She opens the book and writes in it. "Better make a few ways into it just in case one gets blocked" she says as she starts writing.

The ground in front of her starts to shake a bit and it suddenly splits in half one heading left and one heading right, revealing a staircase.

The stairs lead to a door and a beam of light comes out, after scanning her it slides open followed by WELCOME MASTER. She had the book make a base for her under the fountain area.

There was a lot in here. A bathroom, bedroom, large TV, large computer, sofa and kitchen area, everything she needed, for now. There was even a teleporter which led to her closet back at her house.

After admiring her new place, she sits at her new computer and turns it on. After pressing a few buttons the large screen splits into 4 camera views of the outside, one of them showing the girl by the fountain.

"This is perfect, not only do I now have a place to mess around with this book, I can see the fountain area perfectly, when those guys come, I will know exactly what they are gonna do," Karen says, can't helping but to let out a laugh.

She gets up and decides to.....
11221211121122111212.title: Setting up.

112212111211221112121.content:
Deciding to do one last thing before practicing with the book, she gets her mask back out.

Karen has decided to "complete" her disguise, she is no longer happy with just a mask, someone could still recognize her.

She once more writes in the book and her full "disguise" materializes in front of her. Putting her costume on, she admires herself in a full length body mirror.

For now, at least, she decided to go with something simple. Pure black gloves, boots, pants, shirt, and of course her mask with only her mouth showing. The only thing that stands out is a body length cape that can cover her entire body. "This is perfect," Karen says, "no one should recognize me now".

Finished with her place and disguise, she decides now is the perfect time to perform some "tests".
112212111211221112121.title: True disguise.

1122121112112211121211.content: The ground closes behind her as she exits her base, still wearing her disguise. "Time for some fun" Karen says as she looks around and tries to think of where to practice.
1122121112112211121211.title: Outside.

11221211121122111212111.content:
Thinking that it hasn't been that long since she made her base. Karen wonders if she should use some of those people from before, if they were still there.

Deciding to use the fountain area, she now has to figure something out, who to use.
11221211121122111212111.title: Experimenting.

112212111211221112121111.content: Just about everything is set now, all that is left is to decide on what to do to her.........
112212111211221112121111.title: The girls fate.

1122121112112211121211111.content:
"I got it" Karen says as she flips open the book, "I have only turned men into women and make tentacles and a golem appear, time for something "new", she says to herself with a smile.

All Karen knew about the girl was that she had maybe seen her a few times in the hallways at school. She did not even know her name, so, it was very likely that she wouldn't get recognized, though who would know her in her new outfit.

Chelsea, that is her name, the lone girl that is standing by the fountain. She had just finished something important and came here to rest for a little bit.

She has long brown hair and brown eyes, she was slightly taller than Karen with a bigger chest than her too.

Closing the book, Karen waits for the first part to happen....

The ground starts shaking, "what? an earthquake?" Chelsea says surprised as she tries to prevent herself from falling.

If only that was it, to her surprise, she sees a crack in the sky? "What? that's impossible!?" she says as she can not believe what she is seeing.

Cracks started appearing everywhere, surrounding the entire fountain area. She can only just stand there, experiencing amazement and terror at the same time, she had never seen anything like this before, who has? The entire area around her starts to give way, the cracks, having connected, started to fall and disappear when they hit the ground.

She hits the first guy in the head followed by a roundhouse to another, hitting him in the stomach, both hits sending them flying, as she tries to make her way to the hostages. Along the way, she takes out a few more, now only 6 of them are still conscious.

The rest though, are using the girls as shields, "cowards," she says as she stands there. "Hah! nothing you can do now! Is there! Now get us out of here! Or else!" She doesn't respond, she simply makes the book appear and starts to write in it. "Didn't you hear me, I mean it!" She looks at him, "I know. You are very serious right now, however, I have already won," she says as a bright light in the shape of a door appears behind them, they all look back, only to see monsters, monsters of all types come pouring through this door. They quickly leap upon the men, separating them from their hostages and knocking them out.

Now with all the bad people dealt with, she waits for the other part to finish. One of the monsters hits the girls with a strange whitish pollen, sending them all to sleep.

"Good, now for the main part," Karen says as she reopens the book once more.

1122121112112211121211111111111111111111.content:
She has the book and makes most of the monsters vanish, she also makes it wrap a tentacle around every girl and lifts them out to a safer area of her space.

She walks over to the dozen unconscious guys on the floor. With a smile she says, "I can't wait to see the look on your faces when you assholes wake up". She watches as they change, hair getting longer, body weight shifting, and their dicks shrinking into their female counterparts.

Later, after waking up. Shade backs up a bit, and starts to pet a monster in the shape of a wolf. She takes her hand off of it and backs out of the circle completely and says, "ok boys, have fun." And they did, as she finished her sentence they rushed them, each taking turns or doing each girl at the same time, as they played with their breasts and every inch of their bodies and using every single hole multiple times over, even after they had long since passed out.

Over an hour passes, and they finally finish and vanish back to through the doorways that brought them there. Shade then uses her book and does another clean up, (including erasing that one guy's memory of her).

As the girls finally start to wake up, they get a surprise. All 12 guys are unconscious and tied up, and Shade was putting the last guy against the wall with the others.

She notices them waking up and walks over to them. "Are any of you hurt?" she asks, a moment of silence, "well?" she says, trying to snap them out of it, and it does. They tell her that no one is hurt as she starts to untie the rope that is still on their wrists.

Once untied, they swarm her and start to ask her questions. "Wow that was awesome! You really do have powers!" "Hey what's your name? You must have some sort of name picked out for yourself!". She tries her best to answer these questions, until Sarah asks one of her own. "What about Karen? What happened to her outside?" This made the other girls stop talking, as they remembered how he dragged her out of the gym. "Oh, her? I stopped him from doing anything, don't worry, I also told her to run and get the police, who should be arriving any second now," and just like she said, sirens could be heard in the distance.

Shade then jumps out of the crowd and lands a bit from them. "Well, there's my cue," she says, "time for me to go, oh, and you can call me Shade," as she starts to vanish in a black light, but not without the coach and the girls thanking her for saving them one more.

After she was gone, they all kept talking about what had just happened until the police got there. Though Sarah had something else in mind, "why did Karen try so hard to make that guy mad? And why was she smiling when she was dragged off? And that Shade girl appeared seconds after Karen was taken outside. There is something wrong........."
1122121112112211121211111111111111111111.title: Fun, departure, and doubts.

1122121112112211121211111111111111111111.content:
The black light reappears and vanishes, Karen was back at her base.

Looking at a clock, she still had a few hours until the meeting.

It had been an eventful day, just like the past few had been. She wanted to take a long bath, but didn't feel like writing in the book. So she changes out of her costume and takes the teleporter back to her empty house.

Undressing, she lets the water heat up and fill up the tub as she gets in and relaxes.

10 minutes later.

Someone rings the doorbell. "Who could that be?", Karen says. "Ugh, I guess it could be someone important". She has the book materialize and she writes, SHOW ME WHO IS AT THE FRONT DOOR.

An image appears in the book showing that it was Sarah.

With an annoyed groan, she gets out of the tub ans wraps a tower around herself. She heads downstairs and answers the door. "Sarah? If your here than I guess that masked girl stopped them", Karen says, making herself sound surprised and relieved. "Yeah, she came right in and stopped them. She said her name was Shade. I guess you just got our of the shower?". They both go in and sit down in the living room. Sarah takes the TV remote and turns it to a news station.

"Just a little over 10 minutes ago, a group of girls and their coach at this high school were taken prisoner by 12 men. By the time the police had arrived, the men were unconscious and tied up and the girls had been freed. They claim that it was the mask girl that calls herself, "SHADE".......

"By the way", Sarah starts, "that Shade girl said that she freed you and you ran for help".

"Yes, she told me to call the police and tell them to go the the gym. I found one a little ways away and told him. He called it in and told me to go home".

"....That's what they told me. Still, I still think something's wrong", Sarah thinks. "Just answer me one thing. We were all so worried about you! Why did you make that guy so mad?".

"Yeah, I'm sorry for that. But I knew what they were going to do, and if I got them to take me outside, I might of been able to get help. Good thing I was right, huh?".

"Yeah, but it was still stupid. Don't do it again!", she angrily says.

Karen new that Sarah would ask these questions, that's why she had written. THE CLOSES POLICE OFFICER, PEOPLE AROUND HIM, AND ALL RECORDING DEVICES WILL CATCH ME RUNNING TO HIM FOR HELP WHERE HE WILL CALL FOR BACKUP AND TELL ME TO GO HOME. But Sarah was acting...odd. "Could it be that she suspects me!?", she thinks.

"She is my best friend. If anyone would keep my secret, it would be her......".

Does she tell Sarah?

1122121112112211121211111111111111111111.content:

"Yeah".

"And shes gone, let's see..... 6 P.M..... 6 hours till the meeting....".

Still only wearing a towel, she heads back upstairs and gets dressed. Taking the teleporter back to her base, she sits back down at her computer......

Karen had managed to change into regular clothes and mingle with the crowd and was heading home when she felt a tug at her arm. Chelsea, the girl she had turned into a fountain, was at her side. "Aren't you the one who stopped them?"
Karen was quite startled. "Deuce! Where the hell did you come from and how did you recognize me?"
"Well, I figured you would show up as soon as I heard about the break-in on the radio. When I got here, I saw lots of people coming and only one girl leaving. It didn't take much to figure out that it was you."
"Yes, well, keep it down! I don't want people knowing! What do you want, anyway?"
"Well, being a statue was so awesome that I wanted to do more stuff like that!"
"Alright, alright. Like I said, keep it down. Tell you what. I need to stop at home before my parents notice I'm gone. I'll turn you invisible and as soon as I get things smoothed over at home we'll go to my base."
"Awesome! I can't wait!"
"All right, let's duck behind this dumpster." Karen took out her book and wrote "Turn Chelsea invisible" in it. Chelsea vanished instantly.
"Whoa, this is so cool! Um, aren't my clothes supposed to be invisible too?"
"Um, yeah. Hold on, I can fix that. Apparently when I write 'Chelsea', it doesn't include what you're wear--What are you doing?"
Chelsea's shirt floated into the air and landed in the dumpster, leaving flip-flops, floating shorts, and a floating bra, which seemed to unfasten itself and follow the shirt. "Stripping. It's a warm evening, and no one can see me anyway. It saves you from writer's cramp, and when you wish me back you can have clothes reappear on me like you did when my clothes broke off earlier.
"All right, fine." When Chelsea finished stripping, the two girls set off for Karen's house, Karen being slightly unnerved by being able to sense Chelsea's presence but being unable to see her.

"Um, no. This is my bedroom." Karen opened the door to her closet, where her teleporter was. "This is how I get to my base. Just stand on the platform." Karen heard footsteps, and the platform glowed. Karen followed the invisible girl to her base after writing a "clone" into her bed so that if her parents looked in, it would look like she was asleep. The clone was really little more than a life-sized doll wearing her nightgown.

"So this is your place? It's so cool!"
"Gah! All right, I'm writing you back to the visible spectrum now."
Chelsea popped back into view. "Um, clothes?"
"Well, I could give you some if you really want them, but as you want to be transformed I really don't want to deal with them all the time. We're both girls after all, so it's not like it's anything I haven't seen before, especially after the...treatments...I've given the criminals."
"What kind of treatments? Can I try?"
"Um, no. You really don't want these. They're not quite as...comfortable...as what you got."
"So what am I going to be turned into?"

Karen reached down and picked up the flaccid Chelsea. She looked like a flattened version of her human self, only she was only about two feet tall. 1122121112112211121211111111111112122111.content:
"Okay, Mr. Nameless Book or whatever," Karen said. "Why did Chelsea split into seven parts?"

The book's normally smooth, inkless page marred itself with writing, which said, "THE ORIGINAL AUTO-REPAIR PROGRAM INPUTTED INTO SUBJECT ASSUMED THAT SUBJECT'S SKIN TONE REMAINED AS-IS. CHANGING THE SUBJECT'S SKIN TONE IN SUCH A WAY THAT THE SKIN TONE WAS INCONSTANT CONFUSED THE PROGRAM. IT GATHERED THE PIECES ACCORDING TO COLOR AND REPAIRED EACH IN SUCH A WAY THAT EACH WAS INDISTINGUISHABLE FROM THE ORIGINAL BODY FORMAT. HOWEVER, IT WAS UNABLE TO COMPLETELY REMOVE THE PIGMENTATION WITHOUT USER APPROVAL. AS USER WAS UNAVAILABLE, THE PROGRAM COULD DO NOTHING BEFORE THE OPTION SELECTION TIMED OUT."

"Great," Karen muttered, then said more loudly, "Why didn't you - "

"Elincia!" interrupted the purple-eyed Chelsea loudly. "I want to be called Elincia!"

"Why didn't you tell me before you executed the... program?" Karen continued.

"INFORMATION IS DISPENSED ON A REQUEST-BY-REQUEST BASIS."

Karen thought about that for a second and realized that the book was saying that it hadn't told her because she hadn't asked. She drew in a breath to snap at it, but then realized that it wasn't the book's fault; in fact, it wasn't anyone's fault. "Okay," she said. "Will there be any long-term benefits or drawbacks for the Chelseas?"

"PROGRAM WAS UNABLE TO EXTRICATE SENSORY NETWORK TO THE POINT THAT THE SUBJECTS ARE COMPLETE INDIVIDUALS," said the book. "WHAT ONE SUBJECT PERCEIVES, ALL WILL PERCEIVE TO SOME EXTENT. FURTHERMORE, ALL SUBJECTS SHARE ONE EMOTIONAL STATE. IN ADDITION, IF ONE SUBJECT GIVES BIRTH, SUBJECT WILL GIVE BIRTH TO SEVEN INFANTS FOR EVERY ONE INFANT THAT WOULD NORMALLY BE BORN. EACH INFANT BORN IN THIS WAY IS LINKED SIMILARLY TO ITS BROTHERS AND SISTERS."

"Henrietta!" the orange-eyed one yelled suddenly. "I'm Henrietta!"

"Okay..." Karen said. "So, what one of them sees or feels, all of them feel?"

"CORRECT."

"And this carries over into their children?"

"CORRECT."

"Okay," Karen said. "So, what should we do next?"
1122121112112211121211111111111112122111.title: Chelsea's Seven Bodies

1122121112112211121211111111111112122111.content:
Karen wrote, "All of the Chelseas will share one mind, and what one perceives, they will all perceive."

"Huh? What are you..." The question from Henrietta was cut short as she suddenly became one with her "sisters" again. "Hey, what happened?" they all ask in unison.

"I made you all the same person," Karen said. "Congratulations on your return, Chelsea."

"Huh..." the Chelseas said in unison. "It's interesting."

"Hold on," Karen said. Turning back to the book, she wrote, "Chelsea can manipulate each body at the same time as though it were her only body. She can handle the sensory input from all seven of her bodies at once with as much capacity for thought as she could before she had seven bodies." Karen erased the last part of that line, instead adding, "as a supercomputer." She then continued with, "If one of Chelsea's bodies is killed or otherwise rendered unusable, any of Chelsea's bodies can summon that body to their location, fully restored and with every item the restored body had on hand when it was killed." As an afterthought, she added, "Chelsea can, at any point, sever contact between any number of bodies and the whole. At any point, she can also restore such contact. She can do these things with only a thought."

"Now what are you writing?" one of the Chelseas asked.

1122121112112211121211111111111112122111.content:
“Oh, I know,” Karen said, and wrote in the book again.

“Okay, now what are you…” the yellow-eyed Chelsea asked, only to stop and gasp as the blue-eyed Chelsea’s insides hollowed out and she became a human bodysuit.

What Karen had written was this: “One of Chelsea’s bodies will become a bodysuit. Subject will have all the external capabilities of a human, but will be a bodysuit on the inside. Subject will open at the back, allowing any amount of mass inside without needing to stretch and without affecting the total weight of the subject and the items inside. Subject does not need to eat, sleep, rest, breathe, excrete, or otherwise sustain herself. Subject can seal herself at the back, creating an airtight container with limitless capacity. If a living creature is inside, subject can inhale oxygen from the atmosphere and transfer it to inside the bodysuit.”

The indigo-eyed Chelsea looked over Karen’s shoulder at the things that Karen had written. “Oh, so Blue is now a storage container,” she said.

“Yup,” Karen nodded. “Any requests for the other bodies?”

112212111211221112121111111111111212221.content:
The next morning, Karen ate breakfast with her family and headed out the door, claiming that she was going to the mall for the day. As soon as she rounded the corner, she teleported back to the base. She remembered that the meeting at Queen's Forest was supposed to be that night, but she had time to burn until then. Better check up on Chelsea.
Chelsea was still asleep when Karen appeared in the base. Karen scribbled in her book, and a plate of bacon, waffles, and strawberries appeared. The smell woke up Chelsea, and as she got up, her bed whipped around and became a table and two chairs. Chelsea ate quickly, and the dishes vanished. Karen scribbled some more, and some clothes and toiletries appeared for Chelsea. Chelsea went to the bathroom, went through her daily routine, and changed into the new outfit. Karen and Chelsea spent most of the morning playing with the book, causing random things to appear such as two adorable kittens, lots of glitter and streamers, and various other things. When they got bored of that, Karen created a swimming pool and turned their outfits into swimsuits. Schools of colorful fish swam with them in the water. Around noon, they climbed out of the pool. Karen dried them off and returned their swimsuits to regular clothes. As they were walking back to the table, Chelsea suddenly stopped.
"What's wrong?"
"I feel funny." She seemed to be shrinking...no, deflating was the better term. Her clothes fell around her. Karen sifted through them until she discovered balloon-Chelsea, exactly the way she was yesterday.
"What's going on?" Karen ran to her book as Chelsea inflated and returned to normal size, looking quite confused. Karen quickly scribbled "What is happening to Chelsea?" in the book.
Words appeared on the pages as Chelsea turned to stone. "It appears that Chelsea has an allergy to magic. Once exposed to magic, she must be affected by it every twelve hours or she will start to cycle through all spells done to her in the past. If this continues for twenty-four hours, she will dissolve into magic and become immune to it. It is impossible to remedy this allergy aside from casting spells on her every twelve hours or allowing her to dissolve."
Karen looked about wildly as Chelsea returned to human and deflated again. Writing the first thing that came to mind, Chelsea became...
112212111211221112121111111111111212221.title: Reversal?!?

1122121112112211121211111111111112122211.content:
Chelsea the deflated balloon began expanding rapidly again, only this time she remained flat. Her arms, legs, and head did not expand with the rest of her, and they were sucked inside of her rubbery body, leaving holes. The rubber skin became silk, completing the transformation. Lying at Karen's feet was a one-piece swimsuit...an awfully lewd one-piece swimsuit, as the transformation had kept Chelsea's skin coloration. Another scribble and Chelsea was sporting a yellow and pink design. Another few scribbles and the skin coloration reappeared. The swimsuit suddenly inflated and became skin again as legs shot out of the waist. Them arms grew back, and finally Chelsea's head reappeared.
"What was that all about?" asked Chelsea, sitting up.
"It appears that you're allergic to magic." Karen explained what the book told her. "I can write a spell that will automatically transform you every twelve hours, but you'll have to be responsible to get somewhere safe when that occurs."
"Okay, what will you have me turn into?"
"I'll let you decide."
"Um... It probably should be something simple. How about if you turn my skin to rubber for a minute and have it change back? So long as no one's looking too closely at me, it shouldn't be noticeable."
"Done." Karen wrote in her book. "Now, shall we continue experiments?"
"Sounds good to me. I want to try to be a food."
"A food? Like you want me to eat you?"
"Yeah, I've always wondered what it would be like. And you can resummon me with the book."
"True... I am craving something sweet. Like a mint, or..." Karen remembered the pink-and-yellow design of Chelsea the swimsuit. "How about some strawberry-banana taffy?"

"This will take me forever to work my way through your whole body, plus I don't think you'd fit in my stomach. We have two options. I could shrink you down and suck on you in my mouth. Physically impossible, but we might be able to bend physics with this book. What do you say?"

Her face had been wiped away, and only small mounds on her chest indicated that she was feminine. Fingers and toes were non-existent, and her arms and legs were very brittle, so brittle in fact that when Chelsea moved, she accidentally snapped off her own left arm. Karen had an idea. Maybe she could cause the arm to grow back into Chelsea once she finished the rest of her. Setting the arm to the side, Karen popped the mint back into her mouth and sucked away until nothing was left except a pleasant odor on Karen's breath.

1122121112112211121211111112.content:
Karen studied the statue. It looked like an extremely skilled craftsman had made it. Clearly the book had very powerful magic. Karen wondered why her clothes had crumbled, but realized that the stone was so detailed that the clothes had been turned to rock separately, but as rock they were too thin to stay in one piece. Karen contemplated what she should do. Obviously she couldn't leave Chelsea naked and literally stoned for anyone to see, since she was supposed to be a justice fighter of some sort. Besides, Chelsea had offered her help. Turning those who are willing to help into fountains usually didn't help one's conscience. However, Chelsea had seemed to enjoy the sensation of becoming a fountain, so theoretically she would enjoy being the fountain. It wouldn't hurt to keep her happy...

Chelsea began writing. She told the book to have the fountain reappear in the real world, and Chelsea's mouth would become the water spout. She also smoothed out Chelsea's crotch and nipples just in case any teenage boys got some lewd ideas. Finally, she wrote that the fountain would return to this "magic world" after one hour.

Karen returned to her base, occasionally glancing at the screen to make sure Chelsea was all right. Some people walking by were surprised by the statue that had magically appeared, and one old lady grumbled about "modern art being nothing but nude women", but no one even touched the statue. When she wasn't watching the screen, Karen was thinking about the possibilities with Chelsea. She resolved to ask for Chelsea's consent before carrying out any of her experiments, and if Chelsea refused she would be free to leave, although her memory would be wiped.

The hour ended, and Karen returned to the strange blue world where the statue was waiting.

Karen wrote in her book and restored Chelsea's privates. She then returned Chelsea to normal. Instead of starting with her feet, the transformation started with her head. Slowly the unforgiving granite turned into squishy flesh as Chelsea came back to life. As soon as her mouth returned to normal, she was extremely chatty.

"That was the most amazing time ever! The water flowing out of my mouth was amazing! Did you see those cardinals land on my hand? They were so pretty! Oh, look, I can move my arms! And that old woman! It wasn't like I chose to be naked, it just happened! Thanks for covering me up, by the way! It felt really funny when you did it, but it was probably a good thing given how those two boys looked at me. I've never had a boy look at me like that before. Of course, I've never been nude in public before, either. Nor have I been a statue before! It was so much fun! You should try it sometime! Oh, there goes my hips! This feels so weird to be halfway in-between! It's weird being a statue, too! It's like I can't move, but I don't get stiff or anything! I can tell that I'm colder than when I'm human, but I don't feel cold! I feel so comfortable! Oops, there go my feet!" She lost her balance and fell flat on her face, giving Karen a reprieve from the constant flow of words. Of course, once she got up, she was back in full flow again. Finally, Karen took out her book. Chelsea's mouth suddenly vanished. Now the only sounds to be heard was their breathing.

"Okay, here's the deal. First of all, my name is Blackpen, on account of my black clothes and my powerful book. Secondly, you are welcome to stay if you like and be my test subject, since you enjoyed it so much. I am willing to let you pick something reasonable for me to write for every five experiments I put you through. You are also welcome to leave, but I will have to erase any memories from the point you became a statue onwards for my safety. I'm going to let you keep the statue memory as a keepsake and because I didn't do anything to compromise myself. However, I do ask one thing. I'm okay with conversation, but for the love of the pen, take it easy or I'll make the erasing of your mouth permanent!" With that, Karen restored Chelsea's mouth.

"Thank you so much! I promise I'll stay! But what about my parents?"
"I can temporarily write you out of their lives. I can also send you home on occasion, but your memory will be altered until you return."
"Awesome! When do we start? And can I have some clothes?"
"In answer to your first question, right now." The two girls appeared in Karen's secret base. Chelsea looked around, awestruck. "In answer to your second question..."

112212112.content:

Amelia entered her new room. Well, "new" wasn't really the word for it. Everything in the house, including the house itself, was old. Well, everything that had been there when they bought the house. Amelia would have preferred that her room didn't creak with each movement she made, but she figured it helped to deter burglars.

Her mother had moved some books from the old library, now the living room, into her room, which was thoughtful of her. Amelia randomly selected one of the old books, and was surprised to discover that it was probably older than the house. It was bound with leather, which Amelia hadn't seen on any book she had laid hands on, and the pages were something older than paper - parchment? She wasn't sure.

She opened the book. Immediately, an omnidirectional voice called out to her. "Turn to the first page," it said ominously. Amelia shivered and obeyed.

The first page went like so: "NEW MASTER REGISTERED, BEGINNING INTRODUCTORY PROGRAM. THIS BOOK IS KNOWN AS MANY THINGS. THE BOOK OF THE DEAD. THE TOME OF MERLIN. THE LEMEGETTON. IT HAS NO NAME OF ITS OWN. IT HAS THE ABILITY TO ALTER REALITY BASED ON MASTER'S WRITING ON ITS PAGES.

"Alter reality...?" Amelia laughed. "Impossible..." she said. "But just to be sure..." She wrote, "The book, 'What Eric Knew' appears on my bed."

Nothing happened at first, but suddenly a paper-bound copy of "What Eric Knew" appeared on her bed. Amelia took a look at it, looked at the book again, and then at the book that had appeared.

Amelia's mind raced. She could do anything, according to the book. So, what to try...?
