11421.content: Isabella Knox is a buxom eighteen year old that has just graduated from high school. She’s the kind of girl who was able to study hard while also having plenty of time for fun. Isabella is home alone when a mysterious book shows up in the mail addressed to her.
11421.title: Home alone

choices: Something big and odd on a lark
Something small, no reason to go big after all
Before she can write anything, there’s a knock at the door.
114212.content:
“It looks like you’re in trouble there. Can I help?” Isabella purred.

“No! I’ve almost got it. I want to do this by myself,” Sarah responded.

“All right,” Isabella said, completely unconvinced and shrugging her shoulders.

Several seconds later, there was a tremendous roar, the snapping of bones, the tearing of flesh, all overlaid with a horrible screaming that strangled off after several seconds.

“No, no, no!” Sarah shouted.

Following that, Isabella heard the familiar clatter and crash of Sarah throwing her headset into her lap. With a sigh, Isabella directed her character to grab all of Sarah’s dropped loot before skirting around the trap that had killed her partner’s character and continuing down the dark and creepy corridor.

“You could have told me about that, you know,” Sarah said glumly after putting her headset back on.

“I was trying to help you, but you said you wanted to do it on your own though.”

Isabella heard a grumble from the other end of the line, but not the words beneath the breath.

Soon after, Sarah spoke loudly enough to be understood, “Fine, it works out, I was going to have be getting off anyways. We still meeting up tonight?”

“Of course,” Isabella replied as she dodged around a revenant trying to remove her character’s head before returning the favor. That cleared the path so that she could finally reach a safe spot. “I’ll be there around seven; that cool?”

“Yeah, see ya then,” Sarah said before signing out.

Isabella shut down the game herself and groaned as she stretched her arms straight up, thankful to be able to get out of her seat finally. A clatter downstairs briefly diverted her attention, and a quick look at the clock confirmed that it was just the mail arriving. Grabbing her soda, she drained the last lukewarm swallow before wandering out of her room.

The young woman was glad that high school was finally over, even though college was just around the corner relatively speaking. She was looking forward to getting out on her own to be sure, but she couldn’t deny the knot in her stomach as well. Reaching the door, she shoved her thoughts aside as she picked up the mail.

“Bill, bill, Publishers Clearing House, congratulations card from Uncle Ted,” she muttered to herself as she sorted through the stack.

When she got to the bottom though, she furrowed her brow at the brown-paper wrapped package. The handwritten address attached to the front didn’t have a return address, and it was made out for her, but included the fact that she lived in the third room on the left.

“What the…?”

The hair on the back of her neck rose as she tossed the rest of the mail on the table before retreating to her room, never taking her eyes off of the package. Once in her room, she considered getting rid of whatever it was, as well as maybe leaving it alone and waiting for her parents to get back home. Instead, she carefully split the paper and eased the package open. Dropping onto her bed was a leather bound book with weird symbols and markings on the cover.

Hesitantly, she picked up the book and thought she felt a tingle travel up her arm, but dismissed it as just nerves. A suddenly glow seemed to radiate from the odd book, but that was absurd, almost as absurd as the book being addressed to her specific room in her family home. Flipping it open randomly, she saw that the pages were all blank, every last one of them as she flipped through. That was until she came to the first page. Suddenly dark ink started to appear, tracing out letters and then words and a voice seemed to come from everywhere and nowhere at the same time.

“THE NEXT MASTER HAS BEEN FOUND, BEGINNING EXPLANATION.

THE BOOK YOU ARE CURRENTLY HOLDING DOES NOT HAVE A TRUE NAME, THOUGH IT HAS BEEN CALLED A LOT IN THE PAST.

AS THE CURRENT MASTER, ALL YOUR DESIRES, DREAMS, ANYTHING YOU WANT WILL BE GRANTED, AS LONG AS YOU WRITE IT DOWN IN THIS BOOK. ONLY THE MASTER CAN WRITE IN THE BOOK. THE BOOK CAN NOT BE PERMANENTLY DESTROYED BY ANYONE OTHER THAN THE CURRENT MASTER. THE BOOK WILL ONLY SWITCH MASTERS UPON THE MASTERS WISH OR HIS/HER DEATH.”

Isabella yelped and dropped the book as she jumped backwards in fright. After several seconds of nothing else happening, she edged closer to where the book had fallen to the floor. She poked it with her toe before jumping back again. She repeated that again before slowly reaching down and touching the warm cover and finally picking it up again. No more mysterious text appeared and no more voice came from nowhere.

“Jeeze, is this someone’s idea of a prank? Did Sarah do this to me just so she can have a laugh?” she mumbled to herself.

The more she thought about it, the more she felt like this had to be a prank. Sarah had been to her house and her room, so that was an explanation for that part, the handwriting didn’t match her friend’s but that could be easily explained as her having someone else write it for her. The text that suddenly appeared was probably just some type of invisible ink that appeared after the book was opened, and the voice…well, she couldn’t find the speaker, but there had to be one here somewhere…right?

As if there really was a magical book that could fulfill her every desire. She laughed as told herself that, before sitting down on the bed. I’ll just jot something in here and show it to Sarah. She’ll have a great big laugh and we can get on with the night she thought to herself as she reached for a pencil in her bedside table. Turning to the first blank page, she set to writing.
114212.title: The odd gift

choices: My whole life is like an anime.
1142121.content: What does the young woman write down?
1142121.title: Isabella’s big wish

choices: She stops when she sees something weird about a family photo.
The door downstairs opens, her mother is back home.
Isabella grabs the book and makes another wish.
11421211.content:
Isabella’s eyes caught on the sketchbook lying on her desk, as well as the rough drawing she had been working on before getting online with Sarah. The drawing depicted an anthro cow woman lounging before what was perhaps a beachside sunset; she hadn’t quite decided on the background completely. Looking back down at the supposed wishing book, Isabella let out another laugh as she wrote down the sentence “I am an anthro cow.” Sarah knew all about Isabella’s furry art, so they would both have a laugh and they could be done with this freaky book.

Maybe I can ask her about how she did that voice too Isabella mused as nothing happened as she expected.

She was setting the pencil back down where there was a sudden blinding flash. Blinking several times to clear her vision, she then furrowed her brow as she tried to make sense of what she was seeing. Her gaze was frozen on her hand still holding the pencil…but it wasn’t her hand, not anymore.

Black and white fur covered her hand, as well as the arm above it. In an instant, the pencil was dropped and the book was tossed aside as Isabella rushed across the hall to the bathroom. Flicking on the light, she again froze as she saw herself in the mirror, or at least the self that she had become. Her naturally curvy figure had been turned up to eleven. Her breasts, hips, and rump had all expanded dramatically, making the young woman look almost exactly as she had envisioned for her drawing, but not quite had the nerve to actually put onto paper.

Raising a hand to touch the top of her head, Isabella saw her reflection do the same, as well as feeling one of the horns peeking through her hair. Sticking out her tongue, doing jazz hands, and even balancing on one leg, all her motions were repeated by what could only be her reflection. But there wasn’t any possible way for this to happen; she was a human girl, not an anthro cow. Pinching and even slapping herself did nothing to dispel what couldn’t be true. But there it was, staring her in the face: her new face.

Could that book really have worked? she wondered while staring wide eyed at her bovine reflection.

Turning away from the mirror and shutting off the light, she dashed back to her room.
11421211.title: Having a cow

choices: …a real life Jasmine from the Aladdin movies.”
114212111.content:
The photo was from a family vacation taken a few years ago. There was her mom and dad smiling towards the camera and between them should have been Isabella. And she supposed it was, but rather than a rather average teenage girl as it should have been and had been as of a couple of minutes ago, there was an anthro cow that looked like a younger version of how she looked now. In the photo, she was even still wearing the shirt that read “Help me, I’m on a family vacation” that her mom had gotten here while there. She still remembered how she had to fake a smile when her mom presented that gift to her.

Isabella thought that perhaps she should write in the book again and change back, but the more she thought about it, the more right it felt. She wasn’t quite sure that she would have chosen this body if she had known that it would really have worked. Now that she had it though, she was actually starting to enjoy it. So she instead picked up the book, and closed it before placing it on her nightstand. Then she sped downstairs, made herself a quick lunch, and returned to her room to start up a single player game.

A couple hours later, her mother returned home from work. Isabella had been half expecting it, but it was still a bit surprising that her still human mother didn’t react at all to what should have been quite a big change in her daughter. Instead, she just wanted to know if Isabella was heading out to meet her friend again tonight. After confirming that, Isabella returned to her game till it was almost time for her to meet Sarah.

After changing into a tight fitting t-shirt and jeans, Isabella hopped in her car and headed off across the city. She parked her car and then headed through the doors into the mall. She was only marginally surprised that no one around her batted an eye at the anthro cow walking along like nothing out of the ordinary. She was more than a little shocked at Sarah’s reaction when she told her about the change though.

“No, really, I wasn’t like this earlier today. It all happened after we stopped playing co-op,” Isabella stressed yet again.

Her rotund friend scoffed as she had all the previous times, “Give it up, Izzy. No matter how many times you say that, it just isn’t true.” As she scanned through the shelf of games, she continued, “You’re the same girl that I’ve known since the first grade, and that is that.”

Isabella was getting a bit fed up with this, but then a thought occurred to her. “Fine, you don’t think that weird book really changed me? How about I prove it by changing you too?”

Sarah finally looked up and shrugged her shoulders before returning her attention to the shelf before her. Isabella then pulled out the book from her back pocket, flipped to the page where she had made her first wish and started writing, “Sarah is…
114212111.title: Proof

choices: Isabella paused as she thought of another aspect to bring to their relationship.
1142121111.content:
As soon as Isabella finished, there was another blinding flash of light. As she tried to clear the spots from her eyes again, she wondered if there might be any risk of permanent damage from being blinded by the book like that too many times. When she could see again, she saw that the book had indeed worked its magic yet again. Isabella had thought that maybe if Sarah was the one undergoing the change, maybe she would be aware of it too. That idea had been proven false though as Sarah was still looking through the rack of games, the small claws on her fingers tracing across the cases and the scales on her hand and arm completely obvious.

Looking the new Sarah over, Isabella realized that she must have been thinking of that time when Sarah had Isabella sketch her as an anthro dragoness. They had a laugh after they were finished, but Isabella never told her friend of the second one she made later that night. While the first one that Sarah knew about had been pretty close to her plump shape, Isabella drew her much larger in the second case. Judging from how big Sarah was now, Isabella had definitely been thinking of the second sketch.

The bovine’s eyes traced up over the much thicker thighs, rounder rump, swollen stomach, and the blimp-like breasts the other now possessed. Sarah’s new body put even that secret drawing to shame. There were curves in all the right places and all topped off with glittering red scales that were each like a ruby.

“What, trying to see if your ‘magic’ book actually did anything?” Sarah asked with a grin.

When Isabella didn’t respond, Sarah turned around to check out a different shelf of games. Her thick tail caught on a rack of games as she turned though, knocking the whole set to the floor with a clatter.

From up front, Isabella heard the manager say, “Was that you again, Sarah?” When she confirmed it, he groaned. Then he said, “You’re going to have to keep your tail under control, you understand?”

Even with the scales, Isabella could tell Sarah was blushing as she bent down and started to pick up the mess. Her size and weight was obviously making the task a bit challenging, so Isabella slipped the book way again and helped.

Later, after they left the store with their purchases, Isabella’s mind grappled with the idea that she had the power to change reality all because of that strange book. Shaking her head, she realized that she had been idly staring at the shifting hills of Sarah’s butt. Bobbing up and down, they were rather hypnotic. Tearing her gaze away, she mused that Sarah carried the extra weight well. The fact that the much heavier young woman was a dragoness now too just made it even better for Isabella.

She stopped in her tracks as a thought occurred to her. She had wanted to be more than just friends with Sarah for years, but had never acted on the desire and hidden it away in fear of messing up their friendship. With the book in her hand however, she wouldn’t have to fear something like that. In fact, she could bring an aspect to their relationship that she had wanted but would never have done before. Pulling out the book and pencil again, she started to write.
1142121111.title: A scaly situation

115.content: Where did you find the book?
115.title: Finding the book.

12.content: Where do you find it.
12.title: School.

12111.content: Zack, average height with short white hair and blue eyes. He is very smart, but he also isn't a wimp.
12111.title: Zack.

121111.content:
Zack has always been interested in just about anything. Often spending free time at his school's library or one of it's science labs. But he isn't weak, he does spend some time working out, but not that much.

It was just like any other Friday for Zack, school had just ended and he was going to spend a little longer in his favorite Science room. His friends said goodbye like normal, leaving him by himself.

About a half an hour has passed since he started. His work was interrupted by a knock on the door. "Who could that be? I should be the only one left in the building". He goes to the door and sees a shadow walk away. He opens the door and checks the hallway, nothing. He then notices something, a harmless looking brown package on the floor, it was addressed to him. "Huh, wonder what this is", saying to himself as he picks it up and goes back into the room.

Setting it on a random table, he removes the wrapping and finds a black book with odd symbols and markings on it. But something else catches his attention, a letter was sticking out of one if it's pages. He removes it and begins to read it.

TO ZACK. I KNOW YOUR A "SCIENTIST" BUT I HAVE DECIDED TO GIVE THIS TO YOU NONE THE LESS. I NO LONGER HAVE A USE FOR IT AND HAVE MADE A CHOICE TO FIND SOMEONE ELSE TO OWN IT, YOU. THIS BOOK WILL GRANT WHATEVER YOU DESIRE. USE IT HOWEVER YOU SEE FIT.

"What is this? Some kind of joke? Like some silly book can grant any wish". He decides to pick it up to examine it. (See first page!).

He is a bit surprised by this, but he doesn't drop the book. Spending the next several minutes examining the room, he can find no explanation to the voice that had seemed to appear out of nowhere.

Opening to a random page, he pulls out a pen, his scientific curiosity getting the better of him.

"No harm in testing this, but what to try, it should be something so complex or unexpected that there is no way someone can fool me into believing that this is real..... I got it".

Clearing a space on the metal table, he begins to write. HAVE A VERY SMALL SUN APPEAR JUST ABOVE THE CLEARED AREA I MADE. "Now this will prove that this is a hoax!".

Small orange and red balls of light start to gather as the entire area above the table starts to glow. He watches in surprise and fascination as a mini sun materializes in front of him.

"No way, this can't be real, but there is no other way to explain this!". He makes sure that the sun can't cause any damage to himself or the area around him, he then does a few tests to make sure it's real, and it is.

With a huge grin, "there is no way that anyone could make a sun, this has to be real. So much power, but what to do with it?".
121111.title: His now.

1211111.content:
He then remembers something he has always wanted to do, and just maybe, if this book really can do anything, can make his dream come true. With the book still open, he gets rid of the mini sun and writes something else.

"Let's see if this works", he says, closing the book. Closing his eyes and starting to concentrate, his feet slowly lifts off of the ground. Immediately looking down, he sees that he really is floating in midair. He smiles, and starts to maneuver around the room, getting used to how this works. "Amazing, I really can then.... It's time to leave".

Outside and some distance from the school, he takes off, flying into the sky and away from his hometown.

Sometime later, he is somewhere over the ocean. "This place looks good". After writing in the book, he waits.

The ocean starts to bubble directly below him and land starts to emerge from the sea, creating a new island. It suddenly vanishes and he flies closer to it. The island suddenly reappears, he had made it cloaked from a certain distance. A river flows down form a mountain to a lake in the center and then out to the sea and the entire rest of the new island is covered in a dense forest. There is a large mansion by the lake, where he plans on living. He had decided to leave his old life, wanting to continue his experiments here.
1211111.title: Leaving home.

12111111.content:
It has been a month since he acquired the book.

Zack has done countless experiments and tests in this time, having almost no regret of leaving his friends and family behind. "That's enough for today Ginger, you can head home now", he tells a 25 foot long giant lizard. It gives a low hiss and leaves through a large door and back into the forest. "That's enough for today", saying out loud, heading back into the main building.

He lays down on the couch, stretches, and turns on a giant TV. Flipping through the channels, something makes him stop at a particular channel. "Ah!", he says, "it's my old school!". The very high school that he was given the book in was on a new's channel, but something was wrong. There were police cars surrounding the school. He immediately turns up the volume.

"Just a little while ago, a bank was robbed, the police soon responded and a high speed chase ensued. The 3 armed men then took refuge in the school behind me. The entire school has been evacuated, except for one room which the men have taken the teacher and his students as hostages".

The camera zooms in, and it was one of Zack's classes. They focus on the people that could be seen and he recognizes them, his old friends.

"Great, just great.......sigh. I guess I can't leave them like that". The book suddenly appears. He grabs it and gets to his feet. "But how should I do this? I probably shouldn't show myself, a disguise maybe?".

At the school.

Everyone is focused on the room. But their attention is suddenly brought to the school's entrance. It is a clear day, but a sudden flash of lightning strikes the front of the school. Someone dressed in a pure white is now standing there, a dark black book under his right arm.
12111111.title: A month later.

121111111.content:
It's Zack, not wanting people to know who he is, decided to wear a "costume".

Glancing behind him, he sees that the police have their guns drawn at him and all of the cameras are aimed his way. Some police man started giving orders to him, trying to get him to go towards them, who he is, things like that. Zack doesn't give them a second thought, instead, he says something.

"Estilth, show yourself". A giant ball of fire appears in front of him, revealing a girl as it dies down. She is short and has average breasts with short red hair and blue eyes. "What do ya want?", she asks.

"I need you to make sure no one follows me inside". "Roger!", she says, giving him a salute while floating slightly off the ground. Opening the door, "don't hurt anyone", he says, going inside.

Right outside the room, he hears the men talking. They are mad, trying to figure out what to do and how to use the hostages. Fortunately, they don't realize hes there, yet. And he is watching them, waiting for a good opportunity to stop them. Sure, he could use the book, but he doesn't want to.

He gets his chance, one of the men walks past the door. His right hand immediately goes through and grabs him by the back of his neck and is pulled through, the door easily giving away. Some of the people inside scream, surprised by a hand grabbing someone through a door. The remaining 2 are trying to get them to shut up as one of them draws his weapon and goes to see what happens.

Peering down the hallway to the left, he sees something that surprises him, he immediately starts unloading his weapon, but it's no good. Something grabs hold of him and pulls him into the hall. More screams, and the last robber presses his back against the back wall, forcing a few people in front of him, his gun pointing at them.

"Guess it can't be helped", he says. He reveals himself, stepping into the room through the open door. "S-so you took out the other 2", the man nervously says. "Yeah, what of it", Kyle says back. This upsets the man even more and he points the gun at him. "I want you to stay there, or I'll kill them!". Kyle isn't deterred by this and takes a few steps forward. The man fires at him, followed by screams from the hostages. The bullets harmlessly bounce off of him. The man runs out of ammo. Kyle uses this chance and tells the other hostages, the one the man isn't threatening, to run for it, and they do. The man now only has 1 girl as his hostage. And she happens to be an old childhood friend of his.

Her name is Faith, a girl with long blond hair, blue eyes, and a killer body. The man had dropped his gun and now has a knife at her throat. He keeps threatening him and telling him to stay back.

He starts thinking. "Now what......There is a lot I can do.....but what to choose.....Hm?".

A hand comes out of the wall directly behind them and grabs the man by his shoulder. They both let out a surprised yell as another hand appears and grabs the knife from his hand.

It was Estilth, she is emerging from the wall that the man and Faith are against. "Hello!", she says, latching onto him. This frees Faith and she quickly puts some distance between her and her captor.

"I though you were guarding the entrance Estilth". She smiles at him, "well, I was, but with the sudden shooting and screaming, followed by those people running out of the building, I couldn't keep guarding the entrance without guaranteeing that someone wasn't going to get hurt. So, I decided to come help you". "....I see, that was probably the best choice. Good work". Her smile gets even bigger. Kyle looks at Faith, "are you alright?", he asks. She nervously nods. "Good".

Kyle opens the book and writes something in it, a long white rope appears out of nowhere and wraps around the man. Estilth lets go, completely separates herself from the wall and floats on over to his side. "Let's go home", he tells her. Still smiling, she nods, "alright, lets go Ky------I mean master".
121111111.title: Estilth, Faith, and the 3 men.

1211111111.content:
Her eyes widen. "? Kyle? Kyle! Is that you?".

With a sigh, he looks at Estilth, "nicely done". Estilth puts her hands together, and with a small smile. "heh heh, oops".

She immediately runs up to him and grabs him by his arm. Looking up at his covered face, "that is you! Where have you been? Why are you dressed like that? Who is she?", she asks a million questions.

"Those cops are getting close now", Estilth says". "Look, I don't have the time to explain right now", he says, pulling her off of him. He places his hands on her shoulders, "why don't you come with us?".

She is at a loss for words, she doesn't know what to do. "We only have about a minute. They will be here soon".

Placing a hand by her mouth, she starts to look back and forth. She stops. With a determined face, she looks up at him, "yes. I want to go".

The police can now see the room. A sudden flash of light emanates from the room, causing them to quicken their pace. They pass the 2 unconscious men in the hall and enter the room. The only person in the room was the unconscious 3rd man, who was tied up by a white rope.

Kyle, Faith, and Estilth reappear in the mansion on the island. Faith starts looking around the room. "That was fun! We should do more things like that!", Estilth excitedly says. "Yeah, that was quite a rush", Kyle says, removing his mask.

Faith embraces him after he removes the mask. "It is you! It has been a month, everyone thought something horrible happened to you!", she says, with water in her eyes. He places one hand on her head, "um, yeah, sorry about that. Something big happened and I kind of left right after that".

After she had calmed down.

"Estilth, I have a few things to take care of, could you show her to one of the bathrooms? I'll be back as soon as I can", and he exits through the front door, no longer in his costume.

She floats over to Faith and takes her by her hands. "I'm Estilth, nice to meet ya. So your Faith? Kyle has mentioned you a few times. Well, whatever, come, follow me", and she drags Faith deeper into the massive mansion.
1211111111.title: Back at the Island.

12111111111.content:
The door closes behind him. "She should be fine with Estilth, but I have thinngs to do, no time to worry about that".

Kyle spends the next 30 minutes performing new tests and experiments and checking on older ones. But he can't help shake the feeling that he shouldn't of left her alone and that he should be showing her around.

"Ugh, I guess I can end early today". He starts heading back.
12111111111.title: Nagging feeling.

121111111111.content: Something happens with one of his experiments.
121111111111.title: Along the way.....

1211111111111.content:
Kyle was in the middle of the island, by the lake, when he decided to head back to his mansion.

Heading back along the path, not wanting to get caught in one of his own experiments, he is now halfway between the lake and his home.

He notices something near the path. A small plant with pink flowers.

"? What are these doing here? I made these on the other side of the island. I guess their flourishing here". He removes a notebook from his bag and begins to take notes.

Getting to his feet, he trips and does a faceplant into the plant. The plant then releases pollen into the air, and he is suddenly covered in smoke.

As the smoke clears, there is now a very attractive girl with long white hair, large breasts, and baggy clothes laying on the ground.

She gets to her feet and looks herself over, "sigh, great", she says, and continues towards the mansion.

She opens the door and puts her things away, "now to find them". She guesses that Estilth took Faith to the best bathroom in the house and that they were probably still there.

Entering the door, she hears a scream and runs into the bathing area. Upon entering the room, she gets quite a sight, Estilth is naked, and she has a pair of feet sticking out of her mouth.

With a sigh, Kyle walks up to her, "let me guess, those legs belong to Faith". Estilth mumbles something while waving at him. "Don't talk with your mouth full". Estilth swallows the legs, "sorry, yes, I just ate her", she tells Kyle, while rubbing her massive moving gut.

"Whatever, it's not like she'll die, though we will have to find her".

Estilth then gets a grin on her face....
1211111111111.title: Caught in his own experiment.

12111111111111.content:
She then walks over to Kyle and pushes herself against her. Grabbing Kyle, "then why don't you join me?".

Reluctantly agreeing, she goes to the changing room and strips and reenters the bath. She sits down and Estilth grabs her and sits down next to her.

They spend an hour in their as Estilth's stomach slowly shrinks. She then excuses herself, and Kyle stands up. She hears a flush, and Estilth comes back into the room. "She should of been revivied now, lets go find her". "Yes!". And after they dress, they head into the mansion, Estilth holding onto Kyle.

"The only thing to do is to try one door at a time".

"Can't you just use the book?".

"Yeah, but whats the fun in that?". And they open their first door.....

12111111111111221.content: Faith: Can I become a man?
12111111111111221.title: yes (pick what she becomes)

12111111112.content:
Somewhere along a long hallway.....

"I guess I have to explain everything to you. Whatever, I do owe him. We are no longer near your school, this mansion is located in a secret area on the ocean."

"What?!".

"But I'll get to that in a second. That book you saw with him, it is a magic book. Whatever he writes in it, comes true,but it only works for him. He found it a month ago. I see by your face that you understand, yep, he left after he got his hands on it. He then came here and created this mansion and the island that we're on".

"Why didn't he tell anyone?".

"Hmmm, I guess it's because he felt like if he did, he wouldn't be able to come out here. But don't get me wrong, he often talks about his old life, I think he kind of regrets leaving".

"That does sound like him....But what about you? How did the 2 of you meet? And what was with you moving through the wall? Did he make you?".

She stops and crosses her legs, "ahhh, I haven't thought about that in a while........ But, it isn't that great of a story, basically, one day, he gets an idea. "I wonder if demons are real?", he says, and yes, I'm an actual demon. So, he asks the book to brink a real demon in front of him, and hear I am".

".....Ok, but why are you still here? And I though you were suppose to have a tail, you look like a normal girl".

"Right, the tail, I do have a black tail and black wings, but I can hide them, and I'm still here because I want to, he did offer to send me back, but I'm enjoying it here".

"This is still hard to believe, but I guss with what's happened, I have to. Anyway, it's nice to meet you".

"Yes it is, but I do have one last thing to tell you, it has been a month since he made this place, the stories I could tell you. This mansion, the entire island is filled with his tests and experiments, it isn't dangerous here, but I can't even begin to tell you some of the strange things that has happened to me".

"What do you mean?".

"I don't want to spoil the surprise, you'll find out, eventually".

Now what?
12111111112.title: In a long winding hall.....

121111111121.content:
She leads Faith to a large door. Inside, there is a row of baskets on shelves to their left and right with another door directly in front. "I did promise to take you to a bathroom, and this is the best one in the house!".

Getting her to strip and grab a towel, she does the same and takes her through the other door. "Whoa". The room was pure white with a large bath with waterfalls and columns. "The toilet and other stuff are through that door over there".

They spend the next several minutes relaxing and getting to know each other. "Right, I guess there is one more thing I should tell you. As I already told you about this island, but I did leave out something. One of the first things that Zack did was make it impossible for anything to die on this island. As long as we are here, we are immortal, we won't die of age, disease, or anything, even if we are killed by something, we will be immediately brought back". "Thats, amazing, he really did that?". "Yep".

Faith stands up and streatches, "mmmhh, I think I'll get out now. You've made me want to look around".

"Alright, that does sound interesting".
121111111121.title: Relaxing.

1211111111211.content:
Heading back to get changed, a sudden loud rumbling noise echoes throught the room. Looking around, trying to find it's source, her eyes eventually come to rest on Estilth, who is rubbing her stomach. It happens again, and she realizes the noise is coming from her.

"Oh, I'm hungry. That's right, Zack called on me when I was hunting, I haven't eaten anything today".

"Uhhh, I guess we should go to the kitchen?", Faith nervously asks.

Estilth looks up, "....I guess.... Forget it, I know what I want to eat, ant I'm staring at it!".

"What? But you can't eat me! Aren't we friends?".

"Of course, but your forgetting 2 things. 1st you won't die, and 2nd..... I'm a DEMON!", and she lunges at Faith, who lets out a scream.

Before she can react, Estilth grabs her and lifts her into the air. Faith struggles in vain, "you can't escape! I'm far stronger than you humans!'. She then shovers Faith's head in her mouth. Faith easily slides down her throught and into the demon's belly. Once she was in deep enough, Estilth grabs her ass and shoves her in deeper, with the last obstacle out of the way, she easily slurps down Faith's lets and feet.

Patting her stomach and letting out a small burp, "Ah! You humans always taste so good!". Getting back into the bath and laying back, she lets out a yawn, "I always get so tired after a large meal! I guess I'll take a quick nap".

Forced to curl up in the small space of Estilth's stomach, Faith can feel herself being digested. But, it doesn't hurt, it's actually the opposite! It feels amazing! Watching more and more of herself dissolve and join the liquid puddle, she can only guess that it was because of Zack and the book.....

Now completely liquefied, she is surprised to find herself still conscience. But she doesn't stay in her gut for long, she suddenly finds herself being pulled into her intestines. Felling herself getting smaller as she continues her journey, she feels only pleasure. Slowing down, she feels herself hardening and being compacted as whats left of her reaches it's final destination. All she can do now is wait for Estilth to wake from her nap.....

Waking up, Estilth scratches her head and gets to her feet. She then remembers what happened. "that's right", she says, looking at her once again flat stomach. ".....Looks like its time to let her out", saying out loud, feeling Faith pushing against her backdoor. Opening the door to the toilet, she sits down and releases her friend. "You were great, both in and out, I am definately going to eat you again, well, cya in a bit!', and she flushes.

The last thing Faith sees before blacking out was Estilth staring down at her as she spins and gets sucked into the toilet.....
1211111111211.title: Rumble.

12111111112111.content:
Coming to, she finds herself in some room in the mansion, and she is by herself. Getting to her feet, she finds herself still naked. There is a closet nearby, opeing it, she finds clothes for both men and women. Getting dressed, she exits the room and finds herself in a hall, and she is lost.

"Great, I get eaten and now I have no idea where I am...... Sigh, I can't believe I enjoyed that".

"I guess I just have to keep trying doors until I find a way out......".
12111111112111.title: Lost.

1211111111211112.content:
After a few minutes, she hears something behind her, turning around, she sees Estilth flying her way.

Estilth: Sarah! There you are!". She stops and lands in front of her. "Man, I though it would take a lot longer to find you".
Faith: with a sigh of relief, "thank god you found me, I have no idea where I am. And why is this place that big?".
Estilth: Yes. There are hundreds of doors. You could have appeared anyway and it could of taken days to find you, without Zack's book".
Faith: So we got lucky. Then, can you get us out of here now?
Estilth: I don't know, maybe.....
Faith:What? Why?
Estilth: Well, before the incident in the bath, weren't we going to look around?
Faith: Oh yeah.
Estilth: So lets go look around, there are still hundreds of doors and rooms I haven't checked. Only Zack knows whats behind every door.
Faith: Of course he does, well, lets go.
1211111111211112.title: Estilth

12111111112111121.content: As it turns out, they weren't far from the entrance. They find the stairs leading to the front of the mansion and are left with a choice. Try out the many hundreds of doors, or explore the island.....
12111111112111121.title: Inside or outside.

121111111121111212.content:
Estilth: Lets take a look around the island, there are still a lot things there I haven't seen; and besides, I'm sick of being inside. Let's go.
Faith: Ok.

Estilth opens the door and they step outside.....
121111111121111212.title: Go outside.

1211111111211112121.content:
Faith: Where are we going?
Estilth: I don't know.....lets follow the river, she says, as she starts to float again.
Faith: It must be nice, being able to fly like that.
Estilth: It is, and we could always ask Zack to make ya fly.
Faith: Oh, thats right!

The river starts from the lake in the center of the island and flows until it empties into the ocean.

Estilth: I haven't really been on that side of the island. But before we follow it, we'll have to make it to the lake.
Puzzled, Faith asks, "make it to the lake? You make it sound like we won't make it there".
Turning her floating body towards Faith, "that's right. Even though its only about a mile from here, the same goes for out here for what I told you inside".
Faith: Y-you mean about the experiments and stuff?".
With a somewhat interesting smile, "yeah, just like the hundreds of doors inside, the outside, all of this island is filled, littered with his experiments and tests. So, watch out for the plants, animals, anything really. This should be interesting.....It always is".
1211111111211112121.title: To the river.

12111111112111121211.content: The two of them manage to make it to the lake. What happens while their there?
12111111112111121211.title: At the lake.

12111111112111121212.content:
Faith makes her way down a paved road, with Estilth floating beside her.

What happens?
12111111112111121212.title: Along the way.

121111111121111212121.content:
Almost at the lake, and Faith sees something. "Oh! What a pretty flower!", she says, as she steps off the path and walks over to it.

A small patch of large tan and red colored flowers.

Estilth: Wait, you shouldn't go.....", she stops herself. She knows about these flowers and what they will do. Grinning mischeviously, she lets Faith get closer to them.

Faith: Wow, I've never seen such large flowers! They go up past my legs!". She bends over to smell them. The flowers react. Not by blowing pollen in her face, but by flinging some kind of white liquid at her. She steps back, but some of hit hits her square in the face and on her body.

The flowers cease their assault and Faith goes back to the road and Estilth, wiping the strange liquid from her body.

Faith: W-what was that?", she looks at Estilth, who is grinning, evilly, at her. "....E-Estilth, your freaking me out....".
Estilth: I am? Well, sorry about that, I was just thinking of something intersting.
Faith: Something interesting? What is it?
Estilth: Hehehe, I was hoping you'd ask. What I was thinking about is what you'll look like after that liquid is done with you.
Faith: What? I-is the liquid dangerous?
Estilth: Oh no, it just melts whatever it touches.
Faith: !!!!! M-melt!? I don't want to melt! Why didn't you say anything!?
Estilth: I did. I did warn you about Zack's experiments and tests out here. And your forgetting, I'm a demon. I'm not so kind.

A strange sensation overtakes Faith as she starts to stumble. Estilth looks on, grinning, and with an evil laugh, "it's starting! This should be interesting".

Faith stumbles to the ground as the demon walks over to her and pulls at her arm. It stretches a bit, the first sign that Faith's body will soon be a liquid. Her face then lights up. "I just got a great idea! I just have to wait for the right moment".

Taking the temporarily paralyzed Faith , she lays her on the road and floats over her. She then just stares at her, completely concentrating and waiting for whatever it is that she was going to do.

A minute or so later, and Estilth places her hands over Faith, "it's time, your body should be soft enough now".
Faith: W-wha-what are y-yo-you goi-ing to d-do?
Estilth: You'll see.

In a matter of seconds, the sky seems to turn darker and a deep, blood red glow surrounds Estilth. She begins to chant in some unknown language and then proceed to zap Faith with the red light.

Faith just lays there, panting, the light giving indescribable pleasure. She just looks at Estilth who begins to explain what she just did.

Estilth: You want to know what I just did to you, don't ya? It's actually pretty simple. Using my awesome demon magic, I stopped you from melting; however, I did not undo what the liquid already did to you.Your body has been softened, to just the right point so that I can have a few cheap laughs and some fun at your expense. I'm such a demon, aren't I? So the question now is, what will I turn you into first?".
121111111121111212121.title: Malleable

1211111111211121.content:
A simple green door.

"Guess I'll start here".

She reaches for the door knob and turns it, but stops, ".....something doesn't feel right.....".

Planing to just peek inside, she barely opens the door.

But it suddenly bursts open and over a dozen large tentacles wrap around her, she screams, and is dragged into the room, the door closing behind her.

.....

It opens, and she staggers out. A lone tentacle emerges from the room, slaps her ass, then closes the door. Faith leans against the wall on the other side of the hall, her clothes in tatters, cum dripping from her holes and coating her body.

"I'm going to kill him".

She tries the door directly across from it, and its just an empty room, she sighs, "a normal room, but I'm not chancing it", she closes it and heads for another door.

This one is green, just like the room with the tentacles, but its a lighter green. Faith opens it, and it appears to be a somewhat normal looking room.

The walls and ceiling are green, and the floor is a green colored carpet. The bed too has multiple shades of green on it and there are quite a few plants littered throughout the room.

"Can I help you?", someone says. Turning towards the voice, Faith sees a small girl just coming out of what she guesses is her bathroom.

The girl has short green hair and green eyes.

"Huh? Oh, sorry, I'm kind of lost, didn't mean to disturb you", she turns to leave, but then feels a tug at whats left of her shirt.
"Wait", the little girl says.
"Whoa, how did you do that? You were over there!".
"I'm pretty fast, but forget that, I need you help.....".
1211111111211121.title: Green room.

12111111112111211.content:
"W-with what?", Faith nervously says.
"With my plants, well, 1 of them. Its over there".

A fairly large tree was sitting in the corner of her room, but it doesnt look like any tree that she has ever seen.
"Ya see, Zack made that for me, but, its kind of hard to take care of. I dont have to do it that often, but every now and then I have to give it a special fertilizer that I made, its the only way to keep it alive outside of letting it stay on the island".

"And you need my help for that?".

"Yes, you seem, well, actually, give me a second". The girl walks over to a closet and wheels out a small container. "This is it, but its missing the crucial ingredient".

"And that would be?".

"You!".

"Wha?", was all she could say before the girl was on her. Stronger than she looks, she holds Faith down. "I know I look like a child, but I'm far older than you". She flips Faith over, and then, after opening her mouth impossibly wide, puts her, ass first, into her mouth and swallows. Faith melts upon contact with the girl's digestive juices. The girl burps, and the only visible trace of Faith is the small bulge in her gut. "Aahhh! I hope you have a nice trip through me!". Sitting on her bed, "now then, gotta do this carefully.....".

An hour later, and theres a knock at her door. Zack and Estilth enter. "Hey there Lily, have you seen a girl with blond hair and blue eyes come by?".
"Nope, no one like that. I'll tell you if I see her".
"Alright", and they leave.

Another 2 hours pass.

"OH! Ah~! Its time!". Getting up, she slowly struts over to the plant. Taking a small shovel, she digs a small hole by the base of the tree and then tosses it aside. Sliding down her panties, she flips her skirt and points her ass at a wall mirror. "You want out?", she says, giving her ass a shake. She then squats down above the hole she dug and starts to push. Lily effortlessly expels Faith from her butt, she turns around, "you were amazing", she starts, "we should do this again, oh, and thanks for your help!". She fills in the hole and then puts the rest of her special fertilizer around the tree. "Good. Now he'll be ok for a while.....".

Now stuck, and naked, inside of a giant gummy frog, she wonders whats going to happen next. At least she can still see outside of her candy prison.....

Trapped and forced into a ball shape, with only a hazy view through the green skin of the gummy frog to pass the time. Her vision suddenly gets blurry. Faith thinks that its going to eat her, like Estilth did earlier, but she was wrong.

Something is moving up her body, at least, thats what it felt like for her. So she tries to and manages to look at her feet. She cant believe what she is seeing. Her feet have changed color! Her feet, legs, then past her crotch, ass, and stomach, her entire body is solidifying.

12112.content:
Gary was barely awake as usual. Sitting in class was always dull, and he still had two more full years of it ahead of him. After his head fell down on the desk for the third time, he noticed a strange book in his bag.

"Huh, what's this?"

Gary grabbed it and slowly brought it up to his desk, trying to keep anyone else, especially the teacher, from seeing it. As soon as it touched the desk, the book flung itself open to a blank page. Gary was a bit surprised by this, but it was so unusual that he wasn't sure if he had accidentally let it slip from his hand or something. That idea went out the window when the book started writing in itself.

THE WISH YOU WRITE SHALL BE GRANTED.

Gary became a little nervous seeing that.

"What is this thing?" He whispered to himself.

WRITE YOUR DESIRES

Afraid that he would anger the strange book if he did nothing, Gary quickly took out a pen.

"What do I wish for?"

ANYTHING

He looked around room. Mr. Penton was busy writing something at the black board. Gary didn't like him much, he always scolded him about not trying hard enough and not paying attention in class.

I want Mr. Penton to be more interesting.

No sooner than it was written, Mr.Penton started changing. He first became much, much thinner, so much so that only his face was recognizable. But that would not last long, as his thin layer of gray hair suddenly started to come alive and shoot out in short pulses, gaining a faint golden color with every growth. As this happened, his face and body began to change more. In the beginning, it was only his loss of height that was noticeable, but soon Gary could see that Mr. Penton was getting younger too, but that wasn't all, his face was starting to look really strange. By this time, his voice was also completely different, it was much higher, and his inflections were sounded out differently.

That's when the transformation really took off. The no longer old teacher's hair went through two more spurts of growth that were much larger than before, and finally came to rest halfway down his back. His body took on a hourglass shape, especially as his chest expanded into two noticeable mounds.

121122.content:
For a few minutes, Gary just stared wide eyed at his teacher. He was apparently the only one who thought that something was wrong.

"I can't believe that it worked! This book is awesome!"

He grinned as he thought of all the things he could do with it, though he couldn't decide where to start, at least not until his eyes happened to land on Robert. He was, in short, a jerk and constantly went out of his way to bully people for no reason. Gary was a constant victim, and right now nothing was more attractive them reversing their roles.

Gary decided to "accidentally" bump into Robert after class to get his attention, but when the bell rang, Robert made the first move.

"Too easy." Gary chuckled to himself.

"I need math homework, I know you got it, so give it."

Gary just shook his head.

"That's no way for a servant to act."

Robert began to look angry, he was impatient.

"Look freak, math is in two periods. I don't have time to stand around, but if you don't give it to me, you'll regret it later."

Gary laughed. "Maybe if I didn't have this!"

Gary held up the book, with a newly written wish.

ROBERT WILL BE MY OBEDIENT MAID.

A sudden gust of wind blew across the classroom, but only Gary and Robert seemed to notice. The swirling air merely passed over Gary, it was much more interested in Robert, who was being wrapped by the wind. The air looked more like some kind of fabric or web as it bound itself to Robert's body.

"What's going on? Get this stuff away from me!"

Robert began to run around desperately trying to escape the magic wind, but it was impossible. He ended up tripping over a chair and fell to the ground. After a few seconds, the wind broke away from him and disappeared. Robert was left panting on the floor, though there was something different about him, to say the least. He was a tall maid wearing a white apron over a black dress. When Robert caught his breath, he looked down at himself and screamed, his voice of course unrecognizable.

"Wha... what did you do to me!"

He pulled his long hair in disbelief before bringing his shaky petite hands down to cup his newly acquired breasts.

"This can't be real!"

While he was distracted by his new body, Gary confidently strode up to him.

"Oh it's very real, "Roberta". You are finally going to make up for being a thorn in my side, after all this time. From now until I get bored of you, you will work for me and do everything I say. Now, get up, at attention."

Robert stood straight up quickly with his hands folded in front of him.

On her way home, she spots Tiffany. Not having anything else to do, she decides to follow. Watching her enter the gym, she peers inside and sees Tiffany and some girls playing basketball. Closing the door, Tiffany spots her. "Alexis? Is that you?".

"Yeah, I was just wondering what you were doing. I was just leaving".

"Wait, we are just having some fun here, why dont you join us?".

"Huh? really? I guess so. Just give me a second". Sitting in the stands, she takes out the book, MAKE ME REALLY GOOD AT BASKETBALL. "This should be intersting".

"Ok, I'm ready!". Tiffany gives her the ball, "have you ever played before?". "Yes, a little". A few minutes of playing, and Alexis is far better then the rest of them. ".....Wow.....A little, huh? Your really good!". "Yeah, I practiced a lot in my home town".

Some time later.

"I think that's enough, we've been here for a while".

"Yeah, I need to get home soon".

"To the showers then!".

"Eh? What? I'll be fine, I didn't bring a change of clothes".

Tiffany and another girl grabs her. "I don't think so! You are the cousin of my best friend, what better way to get to know each other?". They drag her into the showers, despite her protests.

Accepting her fate, she gets undressed and gets into a stall away from them, trying her best not to peak.

"Why are you all the way over there? Come over with the rest of us!". "I'm fine over here".

Finishing and collecting their things, each girl goes their own way, except for Alexis and Tiffany, they do live right next to each other.

"I'm just saying, your really good, you should join our team". "But I might not be here that long". "That doesn't matter, you'll really help the team! Just say that you'll think about it?". "....Alright".

Almost home, but something happens. They hear screaming. Running towards the noise, they get a surprise. On a side road, a girl was on the ground, and a man was running towards them, but he had a purse, and the girl was screaming for help. It hits them, he just stole her purse!

She instinctively reaches for her bag, but stops herself, if she uses the book here, Tiffany could find out, but she can't just walk away......
1231112122.title: What to do......

12311121222.content:
So she finishes reachingfor her bag and removes the book. She only has seconds as she quickly writes something down.

The man suddenly freezes in place.

"Whats going on?", Tiffany says, surprised. Alexis, though, just walks up to the man, waving a hand in his face, she grabs the purse and heads to the girl on the ground. Helping her to her feet, she hands her the purse. The girl thanks Alexis then runs off. Back in front of the man, "what do I do with him? I cant think of anything".

Tiffany then slowly approached the 2 of them. Looking behind her, "right, I forgot about her". "A-Alexis? Whats going on here? Did you do this?".

"Well, I guess there is no hiding it now. Yes. I did this".

"How?".

"This is how", she replies, revealing the book. "This is a special book that only works for me".

She lets Tiffany look at the book. "Turn me into a girl? Whats this? Wait...........Alex? No, it cant be you.....".

"Yes, its me. I had the book do this to me. And to answer your next question, I just felt like it".

"But, in the gym.....".

"Hey, that was your and the other girls fault, I tried to leave, remember, you all dragged me into there".....

123111212221.content:

"Alright, I do have something to finish up". Alexis goes up to the still paralyzed man. "Ya know", she begins to tell him. "I'm kind of glad you decided to rob that girl. You see, if you didnt", she grins, "I wouldn't have such a great test subject. So, lets begin, shall we?".

She opens the book, and begins writing. She changes him into animals, objects, even food. She even changes his gender and has him raped by people, animals, and monsters. "Hahaha, this is the best! Oh, what else can I do?". Tiffany is just watching from the sidelines, just stunned at what shes watching.

Alexis suddenly feels a hand on her shoulder, it belonged to Tiffany, "I-I think thats enough.....we need to talk". Alexis thinks for a moment, ".....Alright, there are plenty like him out there, just let me do one last thing".

Writing down one last thing, she shuts the book and puts it away. She then lifts her right hand straight in front of her. A glass materializes and she grabs it.

The man, currently a girl, is suddenly released from the paralysis. Stumbling to her feet, she tries to run, but then stops. She starts to float into the air, as something strange starts to happen.

Her body begins to soften, then she is thrown towards the glass, shrinking and liquefying upon contact with it.

A large smile on her face, she dips finger into the liquid and tastes it. "Ooohhh, not bad!", she looks at Tiffany, "want some?".

"Uh, no, I'll pass".

Shrugging, "eh, your loss", and she downs the mugger in a few seconds. "Ahhh, that was surprisingly refreshing", she says as the glass vanishes. "Uhh, what about.....". "Don't worry, hes fine, he'll eventually reappear at a prison, back to normal, where he will confess and not remember a thing. Well, lets head to my house".....

Hes always been popular with the girls, and he knows it. His job reflects this. he works as a waitor for a cafe, bringing a lot of customers there and getting paid pretty well as a result.

His shift was just about over, he was cleaning a table when he notices something on one of the tables. It was gift wrapped and had a card with his name on it.

TO MATTHEW, I THINK SOMETHING LIKE THIS WILL BE PERFECT FOR YOU. USE IT HOWEVER YOU WANT.

"Another gift from a fan. I'll open it later". He takes it, and the other gifts he got, to the locker room and changes back into his normal clothes then heads home.

Back at home and in his room.

He opens to one of the many blank pages. CLEAN UP THE MESS FROM THESE GIFTS.

The entire room starts to glow as small lights fill up the room. The wrappins, boxes, and whatever was unneeded vanishes. The glow fades. ".....Uh.....What? That really worked! B-but what am I suppose to do with something like this?.....".

The room starts to glow once more as small orbs of blue light appear. The lights begin to collect and combine as it gets bigger and bigger. The continuously growing ball of light starts to morph and twist as it begins change shape. The glow begins to fade, leaving only the giant light hovering in the air. A bright flash, and his new assistant is born.

A petite girl with long orange hair, blue eyes, and small breasts floats down onto his bed, naked and asleep.

Matthew sits next to the sleeping girl and gets a closer look at her. "I-it worked.....It actually made her!....She really does look like me. So this is what I'd look like as a girl." He places his hand on the side of her face and she starts to wake up.

A soft moan, and she opens her eyes for the first time. The very first thing she sees is Matthew's smiling face. "Goodmorning.....uh.....welcome to your first day of life.....I guess.....". She sits up and stares at him. Then out of nowhere, tackles him and they land on the opposite side of his bed.

Her arms wrap around him as her body rubs against his. She calms down after a while, and is now just laying on him, a small smile on her face, saying her first words, "master".

Matthew pulls her off of him and she is now sitting across from him. She just stares at him, still smiling at him. "Uh.....ok.....You can talk, good. That means the book did exactly what I wanted", he pauses, "still, to be able to actually create a living person like this.....Just how powerful is it?", she is still staring at him. ".....Right! You need a name! But what to call you?...................Maxine. Yes. Your name is Maxine. That's close enough to my name and is still different enough".

".....Maxine.....", she says to herself. Her smile gets bigger again and she jumps on him once more. "I-I guess you like it, huh?". "Yes!".

A few minutes later, and after removing her from himself again.

He looks her over, "guess you can't stay naked forever", he says outloud, opening the book. A pair of panties, a bra, shirt, skirt, socks, and shoes appear next to her. "Get dressed", he tells her. She puts on everything, except the socks and shoes.

"You have a name and some clothes.....Just a few more things.....but those can wait.....".

"Umm....I have a question....".

"? Of course, and you don't have to be so reserved about it".

"Ok. I know you made me, right?".

"Yeah.....".

"Does that make you my dad?".

"......Uh......I don't know.....Let me think.....Your a copy of me, so we are related.....But your sort or are and aren't my sister, I made sure of that.....And I did make you.....So.....technically speaking.....Yes.....It does, kind of.....I think".

".....Brother and Dad?.....", she tackles him a 3rd time.

This time, he lets her lay there for a while as he strokes her head. He then thinks of something.

"I wonder.....".

"What?".

"You are a copy of me.....Can you use the book as well?......"

"I-I don't know".

"Only one way to find out", he says as he starts to sit back up and she gets off. He grabs the book, opens it to the same page as the wish to make her, and hands her the book and a pen.

Maxine drinks 1/2 of it then hands it to him. "?". "Aren't you thirsty?". He takes it, ".....Yeah.....Thanks", and drinks the rest.

They talk, wash, and get to know each other. About 30 minutes go by and they finally leave.

Maxine: "Yes!"

They walk back into the living room where Matt is watching TV. Max then runs over to him, sits down, lean and grabs one of his arms. Alison and Katelyn sit down on the other side. Alison: "she really likes you". Max: "Of course I do! I wouldn't exist without him!".

A little later.

They start to leave, then Matt stops them. "Max! Wait! Here, write exactly what I just did", he tells her, handing her the book and pen. They look at what he wrote. I CAN USE THE BOOK NO MATTER WHAT AND IT WILL COME TO ME WHENEVER I WISH IT. MAKE ME ABLE TO COMMUNICAT WITH MAXINE THROUGH THOUGHTS. Matt: "this way, if something happens, we'll be covered".

She takes it and does what he said.

"Matt: ".....Of course. She is barely an hour old! And this way, if anything happens, she will be able to get the book or ask me for help. So go have fun now!".

(Time to have a little fun), he thinks, looking for his first target. He spots her. A girl sitting with a few friends at another table. He looks her over, and sees that she has the smallest breasts amongst them.

They all just stare, wide-eyed, as they grow until they are biggest ones at the table. She grabs them, and one of the girls next to her pokes them, to see if this was some trick. The girl than looks down her shirt, and they were indeed real. She faints, and her friends jump to their feet and go to her.....

He slightly chuckles at this, then looks away, hoping to find someone else to test his book on.

He spots his next target. By a candy store, some guy was hitting on this girl and her friend; who were clearly not interested and trying to walk away. (How about a little time on the other side)

The man continues to harass them, but then the girls notice something. His hair was growing! And not just that, his clothes seemed to be getting looser as his voice was getting lighter. 2 mounds started to stick through his shirt and were getting bigger and rounder. She picks them back up, screams, then runs away, the 2 girls laughing uncontrollably.

Twirling the pen in his fingers, (You can spend some time like this), he then finds his 3rd target.

At another table, in between him and the girl with bigger breasts, there sat a young girl, her mom, and a puppy. There is a pet store here, and it looks like her mom just got it for her. He sees how well they get along, then gets an idea.

On the table, was some pet supplies. But, right next to these supplies, a portion of the table started to glow. They stare at it, then the light vanishes and some clothes are now lying there. The mother cautioulsy examines these clothes, then part 2 happens. A thin blue light envelops the dog. The mom immediately grabs her daughter and backs away from it. It slowly starts to grow. It's back legs become feet as it's front become hands. It's fur receeds and stops at it's head which then lengthens as hair. The glow fades and a young girl, about the age of her owner, with dog ears, tail, and a collar is sitting there, looking up at them. The first girl runs over to her former dog and hugs her. She starts happily shouting at her mom, who snaps out of it, and she then walks over to the 2 of them. The mom dresses the new girl and they eventually leave. (I will check up on them later)

Looking around the area, he doesn't see anything truly interesting. (Guess that's it.....It has been a while.....I wonder where they are)

Deciding to find his new sister, his older sister, and his lifelong friend, he pulls out a regular sheet of paper, then writes in his book. TURN THIS PIECE OF PAPER INTO A HELICOPTER AND GIVE ME A CONTROLLER FOR IT. MAKE IT SO I CAN SEE WHERE IT IS AND WHAT IT'S LOOKING AT IN THIS BOOK. AND POINT ME IN THEIR GENERAL DIRECTION.

The sheet of paper begins to fold itself into a shape of a helicopter as a controller appears next to it. Picking up the controller, he turns it on and the helicopter slowly lifts up off of the ground. The page next to his wishes then shows what is directly below the helicopter as it flies up and over the plaza. Matt gets up, the book in one hand and the controller in the other as he follows the arrow leading towards them above the picture in the book and gets an aerial view with his paper helicopter.

Christopher or Chris as people called him. He is 18 and has blonde hair and blue eyes and is a pretty boy. He is smart, but not that athletic and is popular with the girls at his highschool.

Pick him?
14111.title: Chris.

141111.content:
The bell rang, school had just ended, and just like any other day, he leaves the school with a couple girls around him. He knew the girls found him "cute" and he was ok with that, he was popular and smart, the only thing he wished for was to be more athletic, better at sports and things like that. He has always wished this, he was the first in his family to not excel at sports, everyone in his family was better at sports than him, even his little brother and sister.

So when he got home, like usual, he goes for a jog at a local park, trying to make himself stronger, but he doesn't last long, his body tires easily, he just isn't the type for this kind of thing. "Damn, why do I have this weak body!" he yells out loud. He takes a quick breather and leans against a tree. 10 minutes pass and gets ready to run some more.

Just as he leaves the tree, one of his feet hits something. Looking down, he sees something shiny covered in dirt. He bends over and cleans it off, it looked like a plaque. "What the hell? What is something like this doing here?" he sees as he tries to read it.

......DESIRE.....DIG BENE.....PLAQUE. He could tell that it had been there for a long time, most of the words were worn off, though because he was so smart, he easily figured out most of what it was saying. "Hmmm....something like, if you desire power, dig beneath this plaque? At least that is my guess."

He assumes it's fake, but what the hell, its not like someone just planted this, its too old. So he quickly runs home and gets a small shovel and heads back to the plaque and starts to dig.

He has dug pretty deep by now, and just when he was about to give up, the shovel hits something with a clanging sound. He drops the shovel and uses his hands to carefully pull out what was buried there. It was a trunk, a very old trunk. He slowly opens it, and there was a book, a pure black book with strange writings and symbols all over it. He pulls it out and notices a letter with it. He picks it up and reads.

IF YOU HAVE FOUND THIS BOOK, THEN YOU HAVE SOME DEEP DESIRE THAT YOU DESPERATELY WANT TO COME TRUE. THIS BOOK CAN MAKE THAT AND ANYTHING ELSE YOU DESIRE COME TRUE. JUST SIMPLY WRITE DOWN IN ITS INFINITE PAGES.

Being as smart as he is, he is pretty sure that this is some joke, "anything I desire huh, yeah right,....hmmm." though as smart as he is, he can't help but second guess this, "ok, there can't be any harm in just testing this?" he says as he picks up the book. SEE FIRST PAGE.

He drops it, and looks around, no one. This only makes him want to try even more. He pulls out a pencil he keeps on him and prepares to write down his first wish.....

He heard a noise, and thinking it was Amy coming back to get her purse that she had left in the room and not wanting to be caught eating before the meal, quickly added "in a minute". Turns out it was the cat. While Chris was waiting for his sandwich to appear, he absentmindedly doodled Amy's name on the paper. It was a bad habit of his.

Suddenly he heard a scream from upstairs. Just then, his sandwich appeared in front of him...and it was moving! He peeled open the slices of bread, and to his astonishment, a tiny nude Amy was stretched out on his sandwich, covered in peanut butter and jelly.
"Chris? What just happened? Where am I? What is this stuff? Why are you so big?"
"I-I don't know! But I'll try to fix this!" He reached for the book, but couldn't keep his eyes off of the tiny Amy. She would just fit inside of his mouth if she curled up, and he would love to lick off the PB&J...
1411111112.title: Better wait.

14111111121.content:
Chris set the sandwich on the floor and wrote "Return Amy to normal size." Something large expanded in front of him. Amy had grown, but so had the sandwich! She was now life-sized, stuck between two slices of bread the size of a king-sized bed by more peanut butter and jelly than Chris had ever seen in his life!
"Help! I'm stuck in this gunk! Chris, something's on top of me! And why do I taste peanut butter?" Amy's muffled shouts came from in between the bread slices. Chris was thankful he hadn't asked for grilled cheese. He weighed his options. He could be the gentleman and help her out of the sandwich (and maybe get a lick as a reward!), but then he would get messy too, or he could use the book to get her out.
14111111121.title: A BIG Sandwich!

141111111211.content: Now it would be the perfect time to tell Amy about the book…
141111111211.title: Be the gentleman.

141111111212.content:
Chris picked up the book once more. "Remove Amy from the sandwich." The sandwich vanished and Amy was left standing in the middle of the room, looking pale, confused...and fluffy?
"What's going on? I taste bread and I feel so light! Chris, what's happening to me?" Chris watched her in horror as he realized that she was a human-shaped slice of bread. Slowly she began to change. Her skin became creamy and tan, and she seemed to get heavier. "I feel so sluggish now. And I taste peanut butter! Why do I feel like this?" Then her skin turned jiggly and purple and became translucent, and Chris realized that she was turning into grape jelly. Once this transformation was complete, the cycle started all over again. "What's going on?"
141111111212.title: The Living PB&J

14111111122.content:
Reaching down with his right hand, he gentrly removes her from the the sandwich. Barely able to see, she can only feel herself being lifted up. "Are you alright?", he asks.

Trying to get whatever was on her out of her eyes, "yeah, I guess. but what is on me?". Managing to get enough off, she lets out a surprised yell as she sees the giant face of Chris looking at her. Trying to back up, but finding herself unable to, she then sees that he is holding her with one hand. "Wh-what is this? What happened to me?", she says, sounding both scared and upset.

But he doesn't answer, he find himself unable to look away from her. The look on his face is starting to worry her, "Chris? Y-your scaring me!". His face starts getting closer to her. No longer able to hold back, he licks the side of her face. Her eyes widen as his tongue moves across her face. Finishing her face, he moves to her feet, sticking in one at a time, he slowly licks off the peanut butter and jelly. He then does the same thing to her arms. Opening his hand, his tongue glides across her body from her legs to her head multiple times. He flips her over and does the same to her back and butt.

But he wasn't done, he opens his mouth and places her inside. She is in there for the next 5 minutes, her body dancing around inside as his tongue passes over every inch of her. She slips out of his mouth and back onto his hand. On her back, with her eyes 1/2 open, she just stares straight up, out of breath.

Snapping out of it, he looks down at his tiny friend, now covered in his spit. "Oh crap! I guess I overdid it a bit....".
14111111122.title: irresistable.

141111111221.content:
Her eyes close, and she passes out.

Setting her down, he writes in the book. IS SHE ALRIGHT? Words appear on the page. YES. SHE HAS JUST PASSED OUT. Relieved, he picks her back up and takes her and the book to the closest bathroom.

A Bathtub/shower, a toilet and 2 sinks. He has the book clean the sink and fills it up with lukewarm water and some soap. Genly lowering her in up to her neck, he gives her a bath. Finishing, he lifts her out and drains the sink. Wrapping her in a small towel, he takes her and the book back to the where the table was. Sitting on the couch, he puts her, still in the towel, on the table and opens the book. "Guess I need to be careful in how I write".

He spends the next hour testing the book, but puts a just in case wish in it. IF SOMETHING HAPPENS TO ME, I WILL BE BACK IN MY ROOM OR TRANSFORM BACK IN 1 HOUR.

He makes things appear, transform, increase in size, and a whole lot more. His stomach growls, reminding him that he was hungry, the whole friend into a PB&J sandwich made him forget. So he tries one more time. MAKE ME A SANDWICH. Thinking that he did it right this time, a strange sensation hits him. A puff of smoke, and he is now a sandwich. "Great, make me a sandwich, that was smart". And an hour later, and he transforms back.
141111111221.title: Experimenting.

1411111112211.content:
After one of the most boring hours of his life, he sees the towel move, Amy is waking up.

"Where am I? Somethings on me". She struggles to get out of the towel, but Kevin then decides to help her. He lifts the top of the towel off of her. She stares at him, until she realized 3 things. 1st, she was still small, 2nd she was naked, and 3rd, what he did to her after he picked her up.

Her face turns bright red, as she looks away and tries to cover herself. There is a moment of silent awkwardness. Kevin is the first to break it, "L-look, Amy, I'm sorry for that, I, I couldn't control myself".

But she doesn't say anything, she is too embarassed. She does notice something, she is clean, and she is now sitting on a towel that was on her.

"Oh, yeah, I uh, kind of used your sink to, uh, give you a bath. I thought that I should clean you up after that.....".

Hearing this, she just stares at him, her mouth open and her face turning even reder. More silence.....

Tired of this silence between them. "Ok, I get it, your embarassed, I get it, and probably even mad at me, but this is getting us no where". She looks up at him, and sees his hands coming at her. She backs up a bit, out of surprise, but his hands surround her and gently lifts her up.

Close to his face, she has grabbed one of his fingers. She is shaking, and seems really scared. He starts to pet her with his free hand. "Amy? Come on, its me, we've known each other for years. You know I wouldn't do anything to hurt you".

She knows this, but with everything that has happened, she is just too scared.

Kevin realizes this. So, he sits back down on the couch, lowering her closer to the cushion, he continues to pet her and reassure her, trying to calm her down.....
1411111112211.title: She wakes up.
